agree; consent; approve 我的意见你同意吗？ Wǒ de yìjian nǐ tóngyì ma？ Do you agree with me? 他同意这项建议。 Tā tóngyì zhè xiàng jiànyì. He consented to the proposal. 父母不同意我的婚事。 Fùmǔ bù tóngyì wǒ de hūnshì. My parents don't approve of my marriage. 征求对大使提名的同意 Zhēngqiú duì dàshǐ tímíng de tóngyì request for agreement to the nomination of an ambassador 表示同意前一位发言人的意见 biǎoshì tóngyì qián yī wèi fāyánrén de yìjian express agreement with the previous speaker

1 shut; close 把门关上。 Bǎmén guānshang. Shut the door. 这扇窗户关不上。 Zhè shàn chuānghu guān bù shàng. This window won't shut. 2 turn off 关收音机 Guān shōuyīnjī turn (or switch) off the radio 关电灯 guān diàndēng turn off the light 3 shut in; lock up 别把孩子们整天关在屋里。 Bié bǎ háizi men zhěngtiān guān zài wū lǐ. Don't keep the children inside all day. 他昨天一天都关在书房里。 Tā zuótiān yī tiān dōu guān zài shūfáng lǐ. He was cooped up in his study all day yesterday. 关进监狱 Guān jìn jiānyù lock up (in prison); put behind bars 4 (of a business) close down 镇上关了好几家店铺。 Zhèn shàng guān le hǎojǐ jiā diànpù. Quite a few shops in the town closed down. 5 mountain pass; a guarded passage 玉门关 Yù mén guān the Yumen Pass 6 customs house ▶ 海关 hǎiguān 7 barrier; a critical juncture 大考是一关。 Dàkǎo shì yī guān. The final exam is a barrier to be passed. 只要突破这一关, 就好办了。 Zhǐyào tūpò zhè yī guān, jiù hǎo bàn le. Once we have got over this difficulty, it will be plain sailing. 8 a key factor ▶ 关键 guānjiàn 9 concern; involve 这不关他的事。 Zhè bù guān tā de shì. That doesn't concern him. 这些见解至关重要。 Zhèxiē jiànjiě zhì guān zhòngyào. These views are of extreme importance. 10 old give out or draw (pay) 关饷 guānxiǎng (of soldiers, policemen, etc.) get paid 11 (Guān) a surname

1 walk; go on foot 孩子已经学会走路了。 Háizi yǐjing xuéhuì zǒulù le. The baby has learned to walk. 你们是坐车去还是走路去？ Nǐmen shì zuò chē qù hái shì zǒulù qù？ Will you go there by bus or on foot? 过去打运动战, 走路的时间常多于作战的时间。 Guòqu dǎ yùndòngzhàn, zǒulù de shíjiān cháng duōyú zuòzhàn de shíjiān. In mobile warfare, we used to spend more time in moving than in fighting. 2 leave; go away

after; afterwards; later; hereafter 全国解放以后 Quánguó jiěfàng yǐhòu after (or following) the liberation of the whole country 从今(那)以后 cóngjīn(nà)yǐhòu from now (then) on 至于以后怎么样, 我就不知道了。 Zhìyú yǐhòu zěnmeyàng, wǒ jiù bù zhīdao le. I don't know what happened later on. 会议今天开始, 大概一星期以后结束。 Huìyì jīntiān kāishǐ, dàgài yī xīngqī yǐhòu jiéshù. The conference begins today and will probably close in a week's time. 别着急, 以后你会有机会去的。 Bié zháojí, yǐhòu nǐ huì yǒu jīhuì qù de. Don't worry. You'll have a chance to go.

1 straight 街道又宽又直。 Jiēdào yòu kuān yòu zhí. The streets are wide and straight. 把铁丝拉直 Bǎ tiěsī lā zhí straighten a piece of wire 2 straighten 直起腰来 zhí qǐ yāo lái straighten one's back; stand up straight 3 vertical; perpendicular 直行的文字 zhí xíng de wénzì characters written from top to bottom 这屋子直里有六米, 横里有三米。 Zhè wūzi zhí lǐ yǒu liù mǐ, héng lǐ yǒu sān mǐ. The room is 6 metres in length and 3 in width. 4 just; upright ▶ 正直 zhèngzhí 5 frank; straightforward 直认不讳 zhírènbùhuì admit frankly; own up readily 我就直说了。 Wǒ jiù zhíshuō le. I'll speak very frankly. 6 stiff; numb 天太冷, 手指都冻直了。 Tiān tài lěng, shǒuzhǐ dōu dòng zhí le. It was so cold that my fingers were frozen stiff. 7 vertical stroke (in Chinese characters) 8 adverb directly; straight 一直走 Yīzhí zǒu go straight ahead 直奔火车站 zhí bēn huǒchēzhàn head direct for the railway station 直通港口 zhítōng gǎngkǒu lead directly to the harbour 直飞北京 zhí fēi Běijīng fly nonstop to Beijing 9 adverb continuously 新井直往外喷油。 Xīn jǐng zhí wǎng wài pēn yóu. Oil gushed continuously from the new well. 他冻得直哆嗦。 Tā dòng de zhí duōsuo. He was so cold that he kept shivering. 这个故事逗得她直乐。 Zhège gùshi dòu dé tā zhí lè. The story tickled her fancy. 10 adverb just; simply 待他直如兄弟 Dài tā zhí rú xiōng-dì treat him just like a brother 疼得直像针扎一样 téng de zhí xiàng zhēn zhā yīyàng feel a piercing pain

1 essay; article 2 literary works; writings 3 hidden meaning; implied meaning 话里有文章。 Huà lǐ yǒu wénzhāng. There is an insinuation in that remark. or That's an insinuating remark. 其中大有文章。 Qízhōng dàyǒuwénzhāng. There is a lot behind all this. See also 做文章 zuò wénzhāng

1 matter; affair; thing; business 没你的事。 Méi nǐ de shì. It's not your business. 这是怎么回事？ Zhè shì zěnme huí shì？ What's this all about? 2 trouble; accident ▶ 出事 chūshì 3 job; work 她找到事儿了。 Tā zhǎo dào shìr le. She's got a job. 4 responsibility; involvement 这件案子里还有他的事呢。 Zhè jiàn ànzi lǐ háiyǒu tā de shì ne. He was involved in the case too. 有我什么事, 干吗怪我？ Yǒu wǒ shénme shì, gànmá guài wǒ？ Why put the blame on me? It has nothing to do with me. 5 formal wait upon; serve 事父母 shì fùmǔ wait upon one's parents 6 be engaged in 不事生产 bù shì shēngchǎn lead an idle life

1 go 何往？ Hé wǎng？ Where are you going? 2 preposition in the direction of; towards; to 往东走去 wǎng dōng zǒu qù go in an eastward direction; go eastwards 劲往一处使 jìn wǎng yī chù shǐ all directing their efforts towards the same goal 从上海飞往香港 cóng Shànghǎi fēiwǎng Xiāng Gǎng fly from Shanghai to Hong Kong 往左拐 wǎng zuǒ guǎi turn to the left 汽艇往湖州开去了。 Qìtǐng wǎng hú zhōu kāi qù le. He stood there with his back towards me. 这门是朝里开还是朝外开？ Zhè mén shì cháo lǐ kāi háishi cháowài kāi？ Does the door open inwards or outwards? See 朝zhāo

1 nearby; neighbouring 附近地区 fùjìn dìqū nearby regions 附近的城市 fùjìn de chéngshì neighbouring (or adjacent) towns 2 in the vicinity of; close to 住在工厂附近 zhù zài gōngchǎng fùjìn live close to the factory 附近有没有邮局？ Fùjìn yǒu méi yǒu yóujú？ Is there a post office near here? 就在附近, 几分钟就可走到。 Jiù zài fùjìn, jǐ fēnzhōng jiù kě zǒu dào. environment; surroundings; circumstances 换换环境 huàn huàn huánjìng have a change of environment 为环境所迫 wéi huánjìng suǒ pò be forced by circumstances 在艰苦的环境中成长 zài jiānkǔ de huánjìng zhōng chéngzhǎng grow up under tough conditions 环境顺利 huánjìng shùnlì under favourable circumstances 如环境许可 rú huánjìng xǔkě if circumstances permit 创造适宜的经济和社会环境 chuàngzào shìyí de jīngjì hé shèhuì huánjìng create a favourable economic and social environment 改善投资环境 gǎishàn tóuzī huánjìng improve the investment environment

1 quiet; peaceful 这个地方很安静。 Zhège dìfang hěn ānjìng. It is very quiet here. 安静的环境 Ānjìng de huánjìng tranquil surroundings 病人需要安静。 Bìngrén xūyào ānjìng. The patient needs peace and quiet. 保持安静! Bǎochí ānjìng! Keep quiet! 2 calm; undisturbed 周围安安静静的, 没有任何异常情况。 Zhōuwéi ān'ānjìngjìng de, méiyǒu rènhé yìcháng qíngkuàng. Everything around was still and quiet. Nothing unusual happened. 孩子们都已经安静地入睡了。 Háizi men dōu yǐjing ānjìng de rùshuì le. The children are all sound asleep. 3 quiet down 大幕一拉开, 观众顿时安静下来。 Dà mù yī lākai, guānzhòng dùnshí ānjìng xiàlai. As soon as the curtain rose, the audience quieted down.

safe; secure 转移到一个比较安全的地方 Zhuǎnyí dào yī ge bǐjiào ānquán de dìfang move to a safer place 安全到达 ānquán dàodá arrive safely 保证安全生产 bǎozhèng ānquán shēngchǎn ensure safety in production 安全行车 ānquán xíngchē safe driving 安全正点 ānquán zhèngdiǎn safe and punctual running (of trains, buses, etc.) 安全操作 ānquán cāozuò safe operation 安全停车距离 ānquán tíngchē jùlí safe stopping distance 安全高度 ānquán gāodù safe altitude 安全措施 ānquán cuòshī safety measures 安全设施 ānquán shèshī safety devices 安全规程 ānquán guīchéng safety regulations 交通安全 jiāotōng ānquán traffic safety 安全第一! 1 make a noise 别吵! Bié chǎo! Don't make so much noise! 吵得慌 chǎo de huāng terribly noisy 瞧, 孩子被你们吵醒了。 Qiáo, háizi bèi nǐmen chǎo xǐng le. Look! You've woken the child. 别吵他。 Bié chǎo tā. Don't disturb him. 2 quarrel; wrangle; squabble 不要为一点小事就吵起来。 Bùyào wèi yīdiǎn xiǎo shì jiù chǎo qǐlai. Don't squabble over trifles. 我不跟他吵。 Wǒ bù gēn tā chǎo. I will not quarrel with him. 吵翻了天 Chǎo fān le tiān kick up a terrific row See 吵chāo

1 joke; jest 说笑话 shuō xiàohua crack a joke 2 laugh at; ridicule 笑话人 xiàohua rén laugh at sb. 咱们一定要赢, 别让人笑话咱们。 Zánmen yīdìng yào yíng, bié ràng rén xiàohua zánmen. We must win the game, and not give others any chance to laugh at us. See also 闹笑话 nào xiàohua 看笑话 kàn xiàohua

1 simple; uncomplicated 简单明了 jiǎndānmíngliǎo simple and clear; concise and explicit 这机器构造简单。 Zhè jīqì gòuzào jiǎndān. The machine is simple in structure. 吃得很简单 Chī de hěn jiǎndān have simple food 生活得很简单 shēnghuó de hěn jiǎndān lead a simple life 事情没那么简单。 Shìqing méi nàme jiǎndān. There is more to it. 2 (usu. used in the negative) commonplace; ordinary 她的枪法那么准,真不简单。 Tā de qiāngfǎ nàme zhǔn, zhēn bù jiǎndān. She's a marvel to be able to shoot with such accuracy. 这家伙鬼点子特多, 可不简单。 Zhè jiāhuo guǐdiǎnzi tè duō, kě bù jiǎndān. This fellow is no simpleton. He is full of tricks. (see also 不简单 bù jiǎndān) 3 oversimplified; casual 简单粗暴 jiǎndāncūbào do things in an oversimplified and crude way 不能用简单的方法去解决这个问题。 Bù néng yòng jiǎndān de fāngfǎ qù jiějué zhège wèntí. This matter cannot be settled in a summary fashion. 这篇文章我只是简单地看了看。 Zhè piān wénzhāng wǒ zhǐshì jiǎndān de kàn le kàn. I only skimmed through this article.

adverb 1 at once; immediately; straight away; right away 我们马上动手。 Wǒmen mǎshàng dòngshǒu. We'll start working straight away. 你马上就走吗？ Nǐ mǎshàng jiù zǒu ma？ Are you leaving right away? 我马上就回来。 Wǒ mǎshàng jiù huílai. I won't be a minute. or I'll be back in a minute. 演出马上就要开始了。 Yǎnchū mǎshàng jiùyào kāishǐ le. The performance will begin in a minute. 马上集合! Mǎshàng jíhé! Fall in immediately! 2 in the near future; soon 工作没有结束, 他马上还不会走。 Gōngzuò méiyǒu jiéshù, tā mǎshàng hái bù huì zǒu. The work isn't finished yet, so he won't be leaving anytime soon. 马上就要高考了。 Mǎshàng jiùyào gāokǎo le. The college entrance examinations are coming up soon.

1 plan; project; programme 切实可行的计划 qièshíkěxíng de jìhuà a feasible (or workable) plan 宏伟的计划 hóngwěi de jìhuà a magnificent project 河流开发计划 héliú kāifā jìhuà a river development programme 有计划地进行 yǒu jìhuà de jìnxíng proceed in a planned way 计划外的商品 jìhuà wài de shāngpǐn goods produced over and above the plan 计划外项目 jìhuà wài xiàngmù projects outside the plan 2 map out; plan 计划好了再动手干。 Jìhuà hǎo le zài dòngshǒu gàn. Map it out before you start. 我们计划下周出发。 Wǒmen jìhuà xià zhōu chūfā. We plan to leave next week.

1 ugly; unsightly 这座楼房真难看。 Zhè zuò lóufáng zhēn nán kàn. This building is ugly. 他听到这个消息, 脸色变得很难看。 Tā tīngdào zhège xiāoxi, liǎnsè biàn de hěn nán kàn. When he heard the news, his face took on a ghastly expression. 2 shameful; embarrassing 咱们在音乐会上要是演奏不好, 那就太难看了。 Zánmen zài yīnyuèhuì shàng yào shì yǎnzòu bù hǎo, nà jiù tài nán kàn le. It would be a shame if we put on a bad performance at the concert.

1 wide; broad 宽肩膀 kuān jiānbǎng broad-shouldered 宽边草帽 kuān biān cǎomào broad-brimmed straw hat 眼界宽 yǎnjiè kuān have a broad outlook 这条马路很宽。 Zhè tiáo mǎlù hěn kuān. This road is very wide. 2 width; breadth 这条河有一里宽。 Zhè tiáo hé yǒu yī lǐ kuān. This river is one li wide. 3 relax; relieve 听说他的病情并不严重, 我们的心就宽多了。 Tīngshuō tā de bìngqíng bìng bù yánzhòng, wǒmen de xīn jiù kuān duō le. We were greatly relieved to learn that his condition was not serious. 把心放宽一点。 Bǎ xīn fàngkuān yīdiǎn. Relax, don't worry so much. or Don't take it too hard. 4 extend 限期能再宽几天吗？ Xiànqī néng zài kuān jǐ tiān ma？ Can the deadline be extended a few more days? 5 generous; lenient ▶ 从宽 cóngkuān 6 comfortably off; well-off 他手头比过去宽多了。 Tā shǒutóu bǐ guòqu kuān duō le. He's much better off than before.

1 narrow 窄道 zhǎidào narrow path 2 petty; narrow 心眼儿窄 xīnyǎnr zhǎi petty; oversensitive 3 hard up; badly off 父亲死后, 家里的日子过得挺窄。 Fùqin sǐ hòu, jiālǐ de rìzi guò de tǐng zhǎi. We were very hard up after my father died.

1 expensive; costly; dear 这本书不贵。 Zhè běn shū bù guì. This book is not expensive. 丝绸比棉布贵。 Sīchóu bǐ miánbù guì. Silk is more expensive than cotton. 我买贵了。 Wǒ mǎi guì le. I paid too much for it. 2 highly valued; valuable 兵贵精, 不贵多。 Bīng guì jīng, bù guì duō. Troops are valued for their quality, not their number. 3 of high rank; noble 贵妇人 guìfùrén a noble lady 4 honorific your 贵国 guìguó your country 您贵姓？ Nín guìxìng？ May I ask your name? or What's your name, please? 5 (Guì) short for 贵州 Guìzhōu

1 cheap 便宜货 piányihuò goods sold at bargain prices 价钱相当便宜。 Jiàqian xiāngdāng piányi. It's a real bargain. or It's quite cheap. 2 unmerited advantages; unearned gains ▶ 讨便宜 tǎo piányi , 占便宜 zhàn piányi 3 let sb. off lightly 这次便宜了他。 Zhècì piányi le tā. This time we have let him off lightly. See 便宜biànyí
moist; damp 这间屋子太潮湿, 不适宜住人。 Zhè jiān wūzi tài cháoshī, bù shìyí zhù rén. This room is too damp to live in.

1 clean; neat and tidy 把院子扫干净 bǎ yuànzi sǎo gānjìng sweep the yard clean 他穿得干干净净的。 Tā chuān de gāngānjìngjìng de. His clothes are neat and tidy. 屋子收拾得挺干净。 Wūzi shōushi de tǐng gānjìng. The room is neat and tidy. 干干净净过春节 Gāngānjìngjìng guò Chūnjié give every place a thorough cleaning for the Spring Festival 不干不净, 吃了生病。 Bùgānbùjìng, chī le shēngbìng. Unclean food can make you ill. 2 complete; total 把谷子扬干净 Bǎ gǔzi yáng gānjìng winnow the grain thoroughly 忘得干干净净 wàng de gāngānjìngjìng have completely forgotten; clean forgot
internal organs of the body, usu. referring to the heart, liver, spleen, lungs and kidneys; viscera ▶ 心脏 xīnzàng See 脏zāng

1 new; fresh; up-to-date 新技术 xīnjìshù new (or up-to-date) technique 新品种 xīn pǐnzhǒng a new variety 最新消息 zuìxīn xiāoxi the latest news 新社会 xīn shèhuì the new society 2 brand new; unused 新笔 xīn bǐ a new pen 新衣服 xīn yīfu new clothes 3 newly; freshly; recently 新建的工厂 xīnjiàn de gōngchǎng a newly built factory 新漆的门 xīn qī de mén a freshly painted door 他是新来的。 Tā shì xīn lái de. He's a new arrival. 这本书是我新买的。 Zhè běn shū shì wǒ xīn mǎi de. This is the book I've just bought. 4 recently married or just being married 新女婿 Xīn nǚxu a man newly married to one's daughter; daughter's bridegroom 新媳妇 xīnxífu a woman newly married to one's son; son's bride 5 (Xīn) short for 新疆维吾尔自治区 Xīnjiāng Wéiwú'ěr Zìzhìqū 6 (Xīn) the Xin Dynasty (8-23 A.D., between the Western Han and the Eastern Han)

1 turn; shift; change 把全党工作重点转到经济建设上来 bǎ quándǎng gōngzuò zhòngdiǎn zhuǎn dào jīngjì jiànshè shàng lái shift the focus of the work of the Party to economic construction 转败为胜 zhuǎnbàiwéishèng turn defeat into victory 转弱为强 zhuǎnruòwéiqiáng transform (or grow) from weak to strong 晴转多云 qíng zhuǎn duō yún change from fine to cloudy; clear to cloudy 她转过头来和我说话。 Tā zhuǎn guò tóu lái hé wǒ shuōhuà. She spoke to me over her shoulder. 2 pass on; transfer 这封信请你转给他。 Zhè fēng xìn qǐng nǐ zhuǎngěi tā. Please pass the letter on to him. 把她的邮件转寄到她的新地址 Bǎ tā de yóujiàn zhuǎn jì dào tā de xīn dìzhǐ forward her mail to her new address 把钱从活期存款转为定期存款 bǎ qián cóng huóqī cúnkuǎn zhuǎnwéi dìngqī cúnkuǎn transfer the money from a current to a fixed deposit account See 转zhuàn
window; casement

fearful; frightful; terrible; terrifying 做了一个可怕的梦 Zuò le yī ge kěpà de mèng had a terrible dream 真可怕!他自杀了! Zhēn kěpà! Tā zìshā le! How dreadful! He committed suicide. 困难再大也没什么可怕的。 Kùnnan zài dà yě méi shénme kěpà de. However great the difficulties, there's nothing to be afraid of.

conjunction if; in case (of); in the event of 你如果要来, 请事先告诉我。 Nǐ rúguǒ yào lái, qǐng shìxiān gàosu wǒ. Let me know in advance if you're coming. 我们如果不加强学习, 就会跟不上形势。 Wǒmen rúguǒ bù jiāqiáng xuéxí, jiù huì gēnbushàng xíngshì. We can't keep abreast of the developing situation unless we study harder. 我明天再来, 如果你现在有事的话。 Wǒ míngtiān zài lái, rúguǒ nǐ xiànzài yǒu shì de huà. I'll come here tomorrow if you're tied up right now. 如果不是他指引的话, 我们就迷路了。 Rúguǒ bù shì tā zhǐyǐn de huà, wǒmen jiù mílù le. If it weren't for him, we would have gone astray. 如果发生火警, 拨120电话。 Rúguǒ fāshēng huǒjǐng, bō 120 diànhuà. In case of fire, dial 120. 如果下雨, 联欢会将在室内举行。 Rúguǒ xiàyǔ, liánhuānhuì jiāng zài shìnèi jǔxíng. In the event of rain, the party will be held indoors.
seaside

1 forget 我永不会忘记我们初次见面的那一天。 Wǒ yǒngbù huì wàngjì wǒmen chū cì jiànmiàn de nà yī tiān. I'll never forget the day we first met. 他紧张地工作, 忘记了去吃天饭。 Tā jǐnzhāng de gōngzuò, wàngjì le qù chī tiān fàn. He was working so hard that he forgot to go for supper. 2 overlook; neglect 不能忘记自己的责任。 Bùnéng wàngjì zìjǐ de zérèn. One mustn't neglect one's duties.

1 air 湿空气 Shīkōngqì moist air 山上空气稀薄。 Shān shàng kōngqì xībó. Up in the mountains the air is thin. 2 atmosphere 会场上空气紧张。 Huìchǎng shàng kōngqì jǐnzhāng. A tense atmosphere pervaded the meeting. 这里的政治空气很浓厚。 Zhèlǐ de zhèngzhì kōngqì hěn nónghòu. People here take a great interest in politics.
pollute; contaminate 这条河已为该厂的废水所污染。 Zhè tiáo hé yǐ wéi gāi chǎng de fèishuǐ suǒ wūrǎn. The river has been polluted by the waste water from that factory. 污染地带 Wūrǎn dìdài contaminated zone

enter; get into 进入阵地 Jìnrù zhèndì get into position 进入决赛阶段 jìnrù juésài jiēduàn enter the finals 运动已进入高潮。 Yùndòng yǐ jìnrù gāocháo. The movement has reached a high tide. 中国社会主义建设进入了新的发展时期。 Zhōngguó shèhuìzhǔyì jiànshè jìnrù le xīn de fāzhǎn shíqī. China has entered a new stage of development in socialist construction.

1 pass; go through; undergo 这汽车经过动物园吗？ Zhè qìchē jīngguò dòngwùyuán ma？ Does this bus pass the Zoo? 经过长期磨练 jīngguò chángqī móliàn undergo a long process of tempering 2 preposition as a result of; after; through 经过充分讨论, 大家取得了一致意见。 Jīngguò chōngfèn tǎolùn, dàjiā qǔdé le yīzhì yìjian. After thorough discussion unanimity was achieved. 经过抢救, 病人脱离了危险。 Jīngguò qiǎngjiù, bìngrén tuōlí le wēixiǎn. The patient is out of danger after emergency treatment. 3 process; course 事件的全部经过 Shìjiàn de quánbù jīngguò the whole course of the incident; the whole process from beginning to end 事情的经过是这样的。 Shìqing de jīngguò shì zhèyàng de. This is how it happened.

get; obtain; gain; receive 得到及时治疗 dédào jíshí zhìliáo get timely medical treatment 得到群众的支持 dédào qúnzhòng de zhīchí enjoy the support of the masses 退休工人得到很好的照顾。 Tuìxiū gōngrén dédào hěn hǎo de zhàogu. Retired workers are all well provided for.
scholarship; exhibition

1 read; read aloud 这部小说值得一读。 Zhè bù xiǎoshuō zhíde yī dú. This novel is worth reading. 读报 dúbào read the newspaper aloud 老师读一句, 同学们跟着读一句。 Lǎoshī dú yī jù, tóngxué men gēnzhe dú yī jù. The students read after the teacher sentence by sentence. 2 attend school 读完大学 Dú wán dàxué finish college See 读dòu

1 motion; movement 运动的物质 yùndòng de wùzhì matter in motion 运动的形式 yùndòng de xíngshì form of motion 行星的运动 xíngxīng de yùndòng the movement of a planet 运动是物质的存在方式。 Yùndòng shì wùzhì de cúnzài fāngshì. Motion is the mode of existence of matter. 乘敌运动之际, 打击敌人。 Chéng dí yùndòng zhījì, dǎjī dírén. Attack the enemy while he is on the move. 2 sports; athletics; exercise 室外运动 Shìwài yùndòng outdoor sports 游泳是我喜爱的运动。 Yóuyǒng shì wǒ xǐ'ài de yùndòng. Swimming is my favourite sport. 散步也是一种运动。 Sànbù yě shì yī zhǒng yùndòng. Walking is also a form of exercise. 3 (political) movement; campaign; drive 竞选运动 Jìngxuǎn yùndòng election campaign 技术革新运动 jìshù géxīn yùndòng a drive for technological innovation

1 name or given name 您叫什么名字？ Nín jiào shénme míngzi？ What's your name? or May I know your name? 2 name (of a thing) 这种花的名字很特别。 Zhèzhǒng huā de míngzi hěn tèbié. This flower has a peculiar name.

occupation; profession; vocation 从事各种职业的人 Cóngshì gèzhǒng zhíyè de rén people of all occupations 这里填上你的姓名、职业等等。 Zhèlǐ tián shàng nǐ de xìngmíng, zhíyè děngdeng. Put down your name, occupation, etc. here. 他的职业是医生。 Tā de zhíyè shì yīshēng. He is a doctor by profession. 我们的职业有保障。 Wǒmen de zhíyè yǒu bǎozhàng. Our jobs are secure.
an organization in which one works; place of work

1 telephone; phone 请别把电话挂上。 Qǐng bié bǎ diànhuà guà shàng. Hold the line, please. 他把电话挂了。 Tā bǎ diànhuà guà le. He's hung up. 2 phone call 打电话 dǎ diànhuà make a phone call; phone sb.; call (or ring) sb. up; give sb. a ring 他正在打电话。 Tā zhèngzài dǎ diànhuà. He's on the phone. 有你的电话。 Yǒu nǐ de diànhuà. There's a phone call for you. or You're wanted on the phone.

nationality; citizenship 你是哪国国籍？ Nǐ shì nǎ guó guójí？ What's your nationality？ 他是中国国籍。 Tā shì Zhōngguó guójí. He has Chinese nationality (or is of Chinese nationality). 选择国籍 Xuǎnzé guójí choose one's nationality 保留中国国籍 bǎoliú Zhōngguó guójí retain one's Chinese citizenship 国籍不明的飞机 guójí bùmíng de fēijī an unidentified aircraft
marital status

society; community 人类社会 rénlèi shèhuì human society 国际社会 guójì shèhuì international community 社会财富 shèhuì cáifù wealth of society; public wealth 社会地位 shèhuì dìwèi social position; social status 社会福利 shèhuì fúlì social welfare; public welfare 社会环境 shèhuì huánjìng social environment 社会基础 shèhuì jīchǔ social base; social basis 社会实践 shèhuì shíjiàn social practice

1 human relations in society; social relations 2 one's social connections; relatives and friends 她有很多社会关系在海外。 Tā yǒu hěn duō shèhuì guānxi zài hǎiwài. Many of her relatives and friends are residing abroad.

1 connections; relations; relationship 夫妻关系 fūqī guānxi relations between husband and wife 家庭关系 jiātíng guānxi family connections 社会关系 shèhuì guānxi social connections 军民关系 jūnmín guānxi relationship between the army and the people 外交关系 wàijiāo guānxi diplomatic relations 两国间的友好合作关系 liǎng guó jiān de yǒuhǎo hézuò guānxi friendly relations and cooperation between the two countries 搞好关系 gǎohǎo guānxi build (or establish) good personal relations 他们两个人是什么关系？ Tāmen liǎng ge rén shì shénme guānxi？ What is the relationship between the two of them? 他们的关系不好。 Tāmen de guānxi bù hǎo. They are not on good terms. 她和上司的关系很好。 Tā hé shàngsi de guānxi hěn hǎo. She's well in with her superior. 发生关系 fāshēng guānxi have sexual relations with sb. (not as husband and wife) 2 relevance; bearing; influence; significance 这件事跟我没有关系。 Zhè jiàn shì gēn wǒ méiyǒu guānxi. This matter has nothing to do with me. 你回答的话跟他所问的我看不出有什么关系。 Nǐ huídá de huà gēn tā suǒ wèn de wǒ kàn bù chū yǒu shénme guānxi. I don't see any connection between your answer and his question. 这一点对今后工作关系重大。 Zhè yīdiǎn duì jīnhòu gōngzuò guānxi zhòngdà. This has an important bearing on our future work. 你上午去还是下午去,关系不大。 Nǐ shàngwǔ qù hái shì xiàwǔ qù, guānxi bù dà. It won't make much difference whether you go in the morning or in the afternoon. 3 (usu. used with 由于 or 因为 to indicate cause or reason) 由于时间关系, 就谈到这里吧。 Yóuyú shíjiān guānxi, jiù tán dào zhèlǐ ba. Since time is limited, I'll have to stop here. 4 credentials showing membership in or connection with an organization 党员调动工作时要转党的关系。 Dǎngyuán diàodòng gōngzuò shí yào zhuǎn dǎng de guānxi. When a Party member is transferred to another place of work, his Party credentials are sent there. 组织关系带来了吗？ Zǔzhī guānxi dàilái le ma？ Have you brought your membership credentials with you？ 5 concern; affect; have a bearing on; have to do with 农业关系国计民生极大。 Nóngyè guānxi guójìmínshēng jí dà. Agriculture is of vital importance to the nation's economy and the people's livelihood. 交通运输是关系到工农业生产的重要部门。 Jiāotōng yùnshū shì guānxi dào gōngnóngyè shēngchǎn de zhòngyào bùmén. Transport and communications play a very important part in industrial and agricultural production. See also 没关系 méi guānxi

He is very conscientious in whatever he does. or He's a conscientious worker. 办事不认真 Bàn shì bù rènzhēn work half-heartedly 进行认真的研究 jìnxíng rènzhēn de yánjiū make a serious study take seriouly; take to heart 我是说着玩儿的, 你怎么就认起真来了？ Wǒ shì shuō zhe wánr de, nǐ zěnme jiù rèn qǐ zhēn lái le？ I was only joking. explain; expound; interpret 解释一个新词 jiěshì yī ge xīncí explain a new word 解释法律 jiěshì fǎlǜ interpret laws 河水的流动可以用重力原理来解释。 Héshuǐ de liúdòng kěyǐ yòng zhònglì yuánlǐ lái jiěshì. The flow of water in a river is explained by the principle of gravity. 对这件事你作何解释？ Duì zhè jiàn shì nǐ zuò hé jiěshì？ How do you account for this? 这些事实不能有别的解释。 Zhèxiē shìshí bù néng yǒu bié de jiěshì. The facts admit of no other explanation. 这是误会, 解释一下就行了。 Zhè shì wùhuì, jiěshì yīxià jiù xíng le. This is a misunderstanding. A little explanation will clear it up. 你应该虚心听取同志们的批评, 不要老是解释。 Nǐ yīnggāi xūxīn tīngqǔ tóngzhì men de pīpíng, bùyào lǎoshi jiěshì. You should listen carefully to the criticism of the comrades and not keep trying to explain things away. 对本协定在解释上遇有分歧, 应以中文本为准。 Duì běn xiédìng zài jiěshì shàng yù yǒu fēnqí, yīng yǐ zhōng wénběn wéi zhǔn. In case there is any divergence of interpretation of this agreement, the Chinese text shall prevail.

Our neighbours wanted to give us all of their five kittens, but we only took one. 8 leave behind 给她留个条。 Gěi tā liú ge tiáo. Leave a note for her. 请他留个地址。 Qǐng tā liú ge dìzhǐ. Ask him to leave his address. 他把孩子留在家里了。 Tā bǎ háizi liú zài jiālǐ le. He left the children at home. 他死后留下三个孩子。 Tā sǐ hòu liú xià sān ge háizi. He died and left three children. 他父亲死后给他留下一所房子。 Tā fùqin sǐ hòu gěi tā liúxià yī suǒ fángzi. His father died and left him a house. 祖先留给了我们丰富的文化遗产。 Zǔxiān liúgěi le wǒmen fēngfù de wénhuà yíchǎn. Our forefathers have left us a rich cultural heritage. 这次参观给我们留下了深刻的印象。 Zhè cì cānguān gěi wǒmen liúxià le shēnkè de yìnxiàng. The visit made a deep impression on us.

some 有的这样说, 有的那样说。 Yǒude zhèyàng shuō, yǒude nàyàng shuō. Some say one thing, some say another. 这些衣服, 有的好看, 有的不太好看。 Zhèxiē yīfu, yǒude hǎokàn, yǒude bù tài hǎokàn. Some of these clothes look nice, some don't.

preposition 1 except 除了老王, 我都通知到了。 Chúle lǎo wáng, wǒ dōu tōngzhī dào le. I've notified everyone except Lao Wang. 那条山路, 除了这位老猎人, 谁也不熟悉。 Nà tiáo shānlù, chúle zhè wèi lǎo lièrén, shuí yě bù shúxī. Nobody knows the mountain path well except the old hunter. 除了下雨, 我每天都坚持长跑。 Chúle xiàyǔ, wǒ měitiān dōu jiānchí chángpǎo. I practise long-distance running every day except on rainy days. 2 (used correlatively with 还, 也, etc.) besides; in addition to 懂日语的, 除了我还有两个人。 Dǒng Rìyǔ de, chúle wǒ háiyǒu liǎng ge rén. There are two others besides me who know some Japanese. 除了教课, 他还负责学校里青年团的工作。 Chúle jiāokè, tā hái fùzé xuéxiào lǐ qīngniántuán de gōngzuò. Besides teaching, he's in charge of the school's Youth League work. 3 (used correlatively with 就是) if not... (then...); either ... (or...) 刚生下来的孩子, 除了吃就是睡。 Gāng shēng xiàlai de háizi, chúle chī jiù shì shuì. If a newborn baby isn't eating, then it's sleeping. 这几天除了刮风, 就是下雨。 Zhè jǐ tiān chúle guāfēng, jiù shì xià yǔ. Recently we've been having either windy or rainy days.
sell for money 这东西卖不了几个钱。 Zhè dōngxi màibuliǎo jǐ ge qián. You can't get much for this if you sell it.

adverb 1 (used before an adjective or a verb) most; -est 最大 zuìdà the biggest 最小 zuìxiǎo the smallest 最美 zuì měi the most beautiful 最不发达国家 zuì bù fādá guójiā the least developed country 最基本的条件 zuì jīběn de tiáojiàn fundamental prerequisites 他最不讲道理。 Tā zuì bù jiǎng dàoli. He's most unreasonable. 我最喜欢吃巧克力冰淇淋。 Wǒ zuì xǐhuan chī qiǎokèlì bīngqilín. I like chocolate ice cream best. 2 (used before a noun of locality or a place word) farthest to or nearest (a place) 最上头 Zuì shàngtou farthest to (or nearest) the top; at the very top 最东头 zuì dōngtóu farthest to the east; at the very east end

1 the crown of the head ▶ 秃顶 tūdǐng 2 top 此山之顶有一古庙。 Cǐ shān zhī dǐng yǒu yī gǔ miào. There is an old temple at the top of the mountain. 3 carry on the head 头上顶着一罐水 Tóu shàng dǐng zhe yī guàn shuǐ carry a pitcher of water on one's head 农民们顶着月亮抢收稻子。 Nóngmín men dǐng zhe yuèliang qiǎngshōu dàozi. The peasants did a rush job reaping the rice in the moonlight. 4 gore; butt 这牛爱顶人。 Zhè niú ài dǐng rén. This bull gores people. 5 go against 顶风雪, 战严寒 Dǐng fēngxuě, zhàn yánhán face blizzards and brave severe cold 6 push from below or behind; push up; prop up 嫩芽把土顶起来了。 Nènyá bǎ tǔ dǐng qǐlai le. The sprouts have pushed up the earth. 用千斤顶把汽车顶起来 Yòng qiānjīndǐng bǎ qìchē dǐng qǐlai jack up a car 7 retort; turn down 我顶了他几句。 Wǒ dǐng le tā jǐ jù. I said a few words to him in retort. 把抗议顶回去 Bǎ kàngyì dǐng huíqu reject a protest 8 cope with; stand up to 负担虽重, 他们两个也顶下来了。 Fùdān suī zhòng, tāmen liǎng ge yě dǐng xiàlai le. The load was heavy, but the two of them coped with it all right. 9 take the place of; substitute; replace 顶别人的名字 Dǐng biéren de míngzi assume sb. else's name 不能拿次货顶好货卖。 Bù néng ná cìhuò dǐng hǎo huò mài. You shouldn't pass inferior goods off as high-quality goods and sell them. 10 equal; be equivalent to 一台收割机能顶几十个人。 Yī tái shōugējī néng dǐng jǐshí ge rén. One harvester can do the work of scores of people. 11 old take over or turn over ▶ 顶盘 dǐngpán 12 measure word (for things which have a top) 一顶帽子 Yī dǐng màozi a cap; a hat 一顶帐子 yī dǐng zhàngzi a mosquito net 13 adverb very; most; extremely 顶有用 dǐng yǒuyòng very useful 顶小的那个孩子 dǐng xiǎo de nà ge háizi the youngest (or smallest) child 我顶喜欢贝多芬的音乐。 Wǒ dǐng xǐhuan bèi duō fēn de yīnyuè. I'm very fond of Beethoven's music.

1 twig 这棵葡萄长出了许多新条。 Zhè kē pútao zhǎng chū le xǔduō xīn tiáo. This grapevine has grown many new twigs. 2 a long narrow piece; strip; slip 把一块布撕成条 Bǎ yī kuài bù sī chéng tiáo tear a piece of cloth into strips 3 a brief informal note 经理不在, 请你给他留个条吧。 Jīnglǐ bù zài, qǐng nǐ gěi tā liú ge tiáo ba. The manager is out. Will you leave a note for him please? 4 item; article 这项条约的正文共八条。 Zhè xiàng tiáoyuē de zhèngwén gòng bā tiáo. The main body of the treaty consists of eight articles. 5 order ▶ 有条不紊 yǒutiáo-bùwěn 6 measure word (for long or narrow or thin things) 一条床单 Yī tiáo chuángdān a bed sheet 两条鱼 liǎng tiáo yú two fish 三条船 sān tiáo chuán three ships 一条大街 yī tiáo dàjiē an avenue 一条肥皂 yī tiáo féizào a bar of soap 一条香烟 yī tiáo xiāngyān a carton of cigarettes 一条裤子 yī tiáo kùzi a pair of trousers 7 measure word (for certain nouns) 一条好汉 yī tiáo hǎohàn a brave man 两条新闻 liǎng tiáo xīnwén two pieces (or items) of news 四条建议 sì tiáo jiànyì four proposals 一条好嗓子 yī tiáo hǎo sǎngzi a good voice 一条妙计 yī tiáo miàojì a brilliant scheme 三条人命 sān tiáo rénmìng three human lives

1 prop up; put up 支帐篷 zhī zhàngpeng put up a tent 用两张凳子把木板支起来 yòng liǎng zhāng dèngzi bǎ mùbǎn zhī qǐlai prop up the board with two stools 两手支着头 liǎng shǒu zhī zhe tóu rest one's head in both hands 2 protrude; raise 支着耳朵听 zhī zhe ěrduo tīng prick up one's ears 他那两只虎牙朝两边支着。 Tā nà liǎng zhī hǔyá cháo liǎngbiān zhī zhe. His two upper canine teeth protrude. 3 support; sustain; bear 孩子疼得支不住了。 Háizi téng de zhī bù zhù le. The child couldn't bear the pain. 4 send away; put sb. off 把他们支开 Bǎ tāmen zhī kāi put them off with excuses; send them away upon some pretext 这事甭支别人了, 你自个儿去吧。 Zhè shì béng zhī biéren le, nǐ zìgěr qù ba. Don't send anyone else; better go yourself. 5 pay or draw (money) 支拨 zhībō pay a sum of money or transfer a sum of money in payment 上银行支款 shàng yínháng zhī kuǎn go to the bank to draw money 6 (Zhī) a surname 1 branch; offshoot 支店 zhīdiàn branch store 邮政支局 yóuzhèng zhījú branch post office 2 measure word a (for long, thin, inflexible objects) 一支钢笔 yī zhī gāngbǐ a pen 一支箭 yī zhī jiàn an arrow 一支香烟 yī zhī xiāngyān a cigarette b (for troops, fleets, etc.) 两支队伍 liǎng zhī duìwu two contingents of troops 一支舰队 yī zhī jiànduì a fleet c (for songs or musical compositions) 一支曲子 yī zhī qǔzi a tune 一支新歌 yī zhī xīn gē a new song d (for the illuminating power of electric lights) watt 一个四十支光的灯泡 yī ge sìshí zhī guāng de dēngpào a 40-watt bulb e (for the size or quality of yarn) count 六十支纱 liùshí zhī shā 60-count yarn 细(中)支棉纱 xì (zhōng) zhī miánshā fine (medium) count yarn short for 地支 dìzhī (see also 干支 gānzhī)

The army and the people are the foundation of victory. 3 capital; principal ▶ 还本 huánběn 4 principal; major; central ▶ 本部 běnbù 5 adverb originally; at first 我本想不去。 Wǒ běn xiǎng bù qù. According to the weather forecast, it's going to rain tomorrow. 我们∼具体情况制订了这个计划。 Wǒmen ∼ jùtǐ qíngkuàng zhìdìng le zhège jìhuà. answer; reply; response 请回答我的问题。 Qǐng huídá wǒ de wèntí. 1 affirm; confirm; approve; regard as positive 肯定十月革命的伟大意义 Kěndìng Shíyuè Gémìng de wěidà yìyì affirm the great significance of the October Revolution 肯定成绩 kěndìng chéngjì affirm the achievements 对于我们的工作的看法, 肯定一切或者否定一切, 都是片面性的。 Duìyú wǒmen de gōngzuò de kànfǎ, kěndìng yīqiè huòzhě fǒudìng yīqiè, dōu shì piànmiànxìng de. In the appraisal of our work, it is one-sided to affirm everything or to negate everything. 他的设计得到了总工程师的肯定。 Tā de shèjì dédào le zǒnggōngchéngshī de kěndìng. His design was approved by the chief engineer. 2 positive; affirmative 肯定的判断 Kěndìng de pànduàn a positive assessment 他的回答是肯定的。 Tā de huídá shì kěndìng de. His answer is in the affirmative. 3 definite; sure 请给我一个肯定的答复。 Qǐng gěi wǒ yī ge kěndìng de dáfù. Please give me a definite answer. 他今天来不来, 我不能肯定。 Tā jīntiān lái bù lái, wǒ bù néng kěndìng. I'm not sure whether he will come today. 他肯定敌人要逃跑。 Tā kěndìng dírén yào táopǎo. He was sure that the enemy would try to get away. 4 adverb certainly; undoubtedly; definitely 肯定按时送到 Kěndìng ànshí sòng dào guarantee punctual delivery 情况肯定是对我们有利的。 Qíngkuàng kěndìng shì duì wǒmen yǒulì de. The situation is undoubtedly in our favour.

0 requisito 1 ask; demand; require; claim ∼增加工资 ∼ zēngjiā gōngzī demand a raise in pay ∼发言 ∼ fāyán ask to be heard; ask for the floor ∼入党 ∼ rùdǎng ask to join the Party; apply for admission to the Party 严格∼自己 yángé ∼ zìjǐ set strict demands on oneself; be strict with oneself ∼赔偿 ∼ péicháng claim compensation 这项工作∼精神高度集中。 Zhè xiàng gōngzuò ∼ jīngshén gāodù jízhōng. ability; capacity; capability 能力强 nénglì qiáng have great ability; be very capable 培养学生的推理能力 péiyǎng xuésheng de tuīlǐ nénglì develop the students' reasoning capacity 分析问题和解决问题的能力 fēnxi wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì ability to analyse and solve problems 他经验丰富, 有能力担当这项工作。 Tā jīngyàn fēngfù, yǒu nénglì dāndāng zhè xiàng gōngzuò. firmly grasp; pay close attention to 抓紧学习 zhuājǐn xuéxí attend to one's studies in earnest; study hard 抓紧时机 zhuājǐn shíjī seize or grasp the opportunity 抓紧时间 zhuājǐn shíjiān make the best use of one's time 抓而不紧, 等于不抓。 Zhuā ér bù jǐn, děngyú bù zhuā. Not to grasp firmly is not to grasp at all. 必须把农业抓紧。 Bìxū bǎ nóngyè zhuājǐn. We must pay close attention to agriculture. 要按时完成, 我们得抓紧一些。 Yào ànshí wánchéng, wǒmen děi zhuājǐn yīxiē. We must work harder if we want to meet the deadline. 经理对公司的财务抓得很紧。 Jīnglǐ duì gōngsī de cáiwù zhuā de hěn jǐn. The manager kept a firm hand on the finances of the company.

leave; depart from; deviate from 他已经离开北京了。 Tā yǐjing líkāi Běijīng le. He has left Beijing. 小孩儿离不开母亲。 Xiǎo hái'ér líbukāi mǔqin. Children cannot do without their mothers. 离开本题 Líkāi běntí stray from the subject; digress 离不开手儿 líbukāi shǒur be too busy with the job on hand; have one's hands full

1 link; join; connect 把这两条电线连起来。 Bǎ zhè liǎng tiáo diànxiàn lián qǐlai. Connect these two electric wires. 把零散的土地连成一片 Bǎ língsǎn de tǔdì liánchéng yī piàn join together scattered pieces of land 这两句话连不起来。 Zhè liǎng jù huà lián bù qǐlai. The two sentences are disconnected. or The two sentences don't hang together. 2 adverb continuously; in succession; one after another 他连说了三个钟头。 Tā lián shuō le sān ge zhōngtóu. He spoke continuously for three hours. 他连着三天没来。 Tā lián zhe sān tiān méi lái. He hasn't come for three days in a row. 连发三封电报 Lián fā sān fēng diànbào send three telegrams in succession 连挫强手 lián cuò qiángshǒu defeat strong opponents one after another 连战皆捷 liánzhànjiējié win a series of victories; win battle after battle 3 preposition including 连你一共十个人。 Lián nǐ yī gòng shí ge rén. There are ten people, including you. 4 military company 一营有三个连。 Yī yíng yǒu sān ge lián. A battalion has three companies. 5 (Lián) a surname preposition (used correlatively with 也, 都, etc.) even 连我都知道。 Lián wǒ dōu zhīdao. Even I know. 他连报也看不懂。 Tā lián bào yě kàn bù dǒng. He can't even read a newspaper. 他连看都没看。 Tā lián kàn dōu méi kàn. He didn't even look.

1 prepare; get ready 为会议准备文件 wèi huìyì zhǔnbèi wénjiàn prepare documents for a meeting. 作最坏的准备 zuò zuì huài de zhǔnbèi prepare for the worst 随时准备歼灭入侵之敌 suíshí zhǔnbèi jiānmiè rùqīn zhī dí be prepared at all times to wipe out any invader 你准备好了吗？ Nǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo le ma？ Are you ready? 可能还会有更大的洪水到来, 我们必须有所准备。 Kěnéng hái huì yǒu gèng dà de hóngshuǐ dàolái, wǒmen bìxū yǒusuǒ zhǔnbèi. Worse floods are likely, so we must get prepared. 准备阶段 zhǔnbèi jiēduàn preparatory stage 2 intend; plan 今年暑假我准备回老家看看。 Jīnnián shǔjià wǒ zhǔnbèi huí lǎojiā kànkan. I intend to visit my native place this summer vacation. 我们准备下星期一开始试验。 Wǒmen zhǔnbèi xiàxīngqī yī kāishǐ shìyàn. We plan to start the experiment next Monday.

1 above; over; on top of; on the surface of 飞机在云层上面飞行。 Fēijī zài yúncéng shàngmian fēixíng. The plane flew above the clouds. 粉墙上面挂着大幅标语。 Fěnqiáng shàngmian guà zhe dàfú biāoyǔ. Large streamers bearing slogans were hanging on the white wall. 你的行李袋就在我的箱子上面。 Nǐ de xínglǐdài jiù zài wǒ de xiāngzi shàngmian. Your bag is on top of my suit-case. 上面就是琉璃塔了。 Shàngmian jiùshì liúlítǎ le. Further up is the glazed-tile pagoda. 大桥上面走汽车, 下面走火车。 Dà qiáo shàngmian zǒu qìchē, xiàmian zǒu huǒchē. The upper deck of the bridge is for motor vehicles, the lower deck for trains. 运河上面架了一座桥。 Yùnhé shàngmian jià le yī zuò qiáo. A bridge has been built across the canal. 2 above-mentioned; aforesaid; foregoing 上面所举的例子 Shàngmian suǒ jǔ de lìzi the above-mentioned example 上面这几条理由 shàngmian zhè jǐ tiáo lǐyóu the aforesaid reasons 上面几个发言 shàngmian jǐ ge fāyán the speeches you've just heard; the previous speeches 3 higher authorities; higher-ups 上面有指示。 Shàngmian yǒu zhǐshì. There are instructions from above. 4 aspect; respect; regard 他在外语上面下了很多功夫。 Tā zài wàiyǔ shàngmian xià le hěn duō gōngfu. He has put a lot of effort into his study of foreign languages. 5 the elder generation of one's family; the elders

1 below; under; underneath 大桥下面 dà qiáo xiàmian under the bridge 图表下面的说明 túbiǎo xiàmian de shuōmíng the caption below the chart 褥子下面铺着一领席。 Rùzi xiàmian pū zhe yī lǐng xí. There is a mat underneath the mattress. 2 the next in order; following 下面该谁了？ Xiàmian gāi shuí le？ Who's next? 下面一个 xiàmian yī ge the next one 必须记住下面几点。 Bìxū jìzhu xiàmian jǐ diǎn. The following points should be borne in mind. 下面请老李谈谈。 Xiàmian qǐng lǎo lǐ tán tán. Now we'll ask Lao Li to say something. 这个问题我下面还要谈到。 Zhège wèntí wǒ xiàmian hái yào tán dào. I'll come back to this point later on. 3 lower level; subordinate 细心倾听下面的意见 Xìxīn qīngtīng xiàmian de yìjian listen carefully to the views of one's subordinates 了解下面的情况 liǎojiě xiàmian de qíngkuàng find out about how things are at the lower levels

1 in front; at the head; ahead 在房子前面 zài fángzi qiánmian in front of the house 前面有座位。 Qiánmian yǒu zuòwèi. There're seats in the front rows. 走在队伍前面 Zǒu zài duìwu qiánmian march at the head of the column 前面就是宿营地。 Qiánmian jiùshì sùyíngdì. The campsite is right ahead. 前面来了一个人。 Qiánmian lái le yī ge rén. A man was coming towards us. 科学研究工作应当走在经济建设的前面。 Kēxué yánjiū gōngzuò yīngdāng zǒu zài jīngjì jiànshè de qiánmian. Scientific research should anticipate economic construction. 2 above; preceding 前面提到的原则 Qiánmian tídào de yuánzé the above-mentioned principle 前面的一章 qiánmian de yī zhāng the preceding chapter
1 at the back; in the rear; behind 后面还有座位。 Hòumian háiyǒu zuòwèi. There are vacant seats at the back. 2 later 这个问题我后面还要讲。 Zhège wèntí wǒ hòumian háiyào jiǎng. I'll come back to this question later.

inside; in; within 他们都在里边。 Tāmen dōu zài lǐbian. They are all inside. 里边有很多人。 Lǐbian yǒu hěn duō rén. There are a lot of people inside. 这所房子里边还没完工。 Zhè suǒ fángzi lǐbian hái méi wángōng. The inside of this house isn't finished yet. 他一年里边没有请过一次假。 Tā yī nián lǐbian méiyǒu qǐng guò yī cì jià. He has not once asked for leave during the whole year. 这里边有问题。 Zhèlǐ bian yǒu wèntí. There is something wrong here. or Something is wrong here. 里边请! Lǐbian qǐng! Come on in, please!

Her son works somewhere away from home. 3 exterior; outside 行李卷儿外边再裹一层塑料布。 Xínglijuǎnr wàibian zài guǒ yī céng sùliào bù. Wrap a plastic sheet round the bedroll.

1 among; between 生活在人民群众中间 shēnghuó zài rénmín qúnzhòng zhōngjiān live among the masses of the people 坐在他们两人中间 zuò zài tāmen liǎng rén zhōngjiān sit between the two of them 她是我们三人中间最年轻的。 Tā shì wǒmen sān rén zhōngjiān zuì niánqīng de. She is the youngest of us three. 2 centre; middle 中间突破 Zhōngjiān tūpò make a breakthrough at the centre (or in the middle) 中间剥削 zhōngjiān bōxuē middleman's exploitation 中间道路 zhōngjiān dàolù middle road 中间地带 zhōngjiān dìdài intermediate zone 中间分子 zhōngjiān fènzǐ middle (or intermediate) element 中间路线 zhōngjiān lùxiàn middle-of-the-road line; middle road 中间状态 zhōngjiān zhuàngtài intermediate state 从我家到工厂, 中间要换车。 Cóng wǒ jiā dào gōngchǎng, zhōngjiān yào huàn chē. 1 opposite 他家就在我家对面。 Tā jiā jiù zài wǒ jiā duìmiàn. His house is opposite mine. 2 right in front 对面来了一位解放军。 Duìmiàn lái le yī wèi jiěfàngjūn. A PLA man came towards us. 3 face to face 这事儿得他们本人对面儿谈。 Zhè shìr děi tāmen běnrén duìmiànr tán. They should talk about this face to face. 他俩对面坐着。 Tā liǎ duìmiàn zuò zhe. The two of them sat facing each other.
salary; pay; wages

1 adverb still; yet 废物还是可以利用。 Fèiwù háishi kěyǐ lìyòng. Waste materials can still be made use of. 这次还是他做我们的向导。 Zhècì háishi tā zuò wǒmen de xiàngdǎo. He is still our guide for this trip. 她还是会来的。 Tā hái shi huì lái de. She may come yet. 尽管旱情严重, 今年的小麦还是丰收了。 Jǐnguǎn hànqíng yánzhòng, jīnnián de xiǎomài háishi fēngshōu le. Despite the serious drought, the wheat harvest this year was good. 2 adverb (expressing a preference for an alternative) 天冷了, 你还是多穿点儿吧。 Tiān lěng le, nǐ hái shi duō chuān diǎnr ba. It's getting cold, you'd better put on more clothes. 还是你来吧, 我在家等你。 Hái shi nǐ lái ba, wǒ zài jiā děng nǐ. It would be better for you to come; I'll be at home waiting for you. 还是坐飞机快。 Hái shi zuò fēijī kuài. It's much faster to travel by plane after all. 3 adverb (expressing realization or discovery) 这个人还是真了不起。 Zhège rén hái shi zhēn liǎobuqǐ. This chap is really great. 还是利害的人有办法。 Háishi lìhai de rén yǒu bànfǎ. It's the pushing type that gets on. 我没想到这事儿还是真难办。 Wǒ méi xiǎngdào zhè shìr hái shi zhēn nán bàn. I didn't expect it to be so difficult. 4 conjunction or 你去, 还是他去？ Nǐ qù, háishi tā qù？ Are you going or is he? 先去上海还是先去西安没有最后定。 Xiān qù Shànghǎi háishi xiān qù Xī'ān méiyǒu zuìhòu dìng. We haven't decided yet whether we go to Shanghai or Xi'an first. 5 conjunction no matter what, how etc.; whether...or...; regardless of 无论唱歌还是跳舞, 她都行。 Wúlùn chànggē háishi tiàowǔ, tā dōu xíng. Singing or dancing, she is good at them all. 不管刮风还是下雨, 他天天准时到校。 Bùguǎn guāfēng háishi xiàyǔ, tā tiāntiān zhǔnshí dào xiào. He goes to school on time everyday no matter whether it rains or blows.
AUXV cannot

0 tan 1 so; such; this way; like this 他就是∼个人。 Tā jiù shì ∼ ge rén. That's just like him. 那个句子应该∼译。 Nàge jùzi yīnggāi ∼ yì. The sentence should be translated this way. 大家都∼说。 Dàjiā dōu ∼ shuō. So they say. 往∼挪一挪。 Wǎng ∼ nuó yī nuó. Move over this way a little bit. 有∼回事。 Yǒu ∼ huí shì. Yes, that's true.

1 impatient; anxious 急着要出发 Jí zhe yào chūfā be impatient to set out 2 worry 你怎么来得这么晚, 真把人急死啦! Nǐ zěnme lái de zhème wǎn, zhēn bǎ rén jí sǐ la! Why are you so late? We were worried to death about you. 3 irritated; annoyed; nettled 你老唠叨他, 会把他弄急的。 Nǐ lǎo láodao tā, huì bǎ tā nòng jí de. If you keep nagging him, you'll make him very annoyed. 我没想到他真急了。 Wǒ méi xiǎngdào tā zhēn jí le. I didn't expect him to get angry. 4 fast; rapid; violent 水流很急。 Shuǐliú hěn jí. The current is swift. or It's a strong current. 雨下得正急。 Yǔ xià de zhèng jí. It's raining hard. 急转弯 jízhuǎnwān make a sharp turn 5 urgent; pressing 事情很急, 必须立即处理。 Shìqing hěn jí, bìxū lìjí chǔlǐ. The matter is pressing (or urgent) and must be dealt with at once. 他走得很急。 Tā zǒu de hěn jí. He left in a hurry. 6 urgency; emergency ▶ 应急 yìngjí 7 be eager to help 急人之难 jírénzhīnàn be eager to help those in need 急病人之所急 jí bìngrén zhī suǒ jí be eager to meet the needs of the patients; put oneself in a patient's position
ADJT bigger and bigger

1 receive; accept 请收下作为纪念。 Qǐng shōu xià zuòwéi jìniàn. Please accept this as a souvenir. 学校今年又收了一批研究生。 Xuéxiào jīnnián yòu shōu le yī pī yánjiūshēng. The college has enrolled another group of research students this year. 这本词典共收词六万余条。 Zhè běn cídiǎn gòng shōu cí liùwàn yú tiáo. The dictionary contains over 60,000 entries. 2 put away; take in 收工具 Shōu gōngjù put the tools away 洗的衣服收了没有？ Xǐ de yīfu shōu le méiyǒu？ Have you brought in the washing? 3 collect 收水电费 shōu shuǐ-diànfèi collect water and electricity bills 收税 shōushuì collect taxes 收废品 shōu fèipǐn collect scrap 4 money received; receipts; income ▶ 税收 shuìshōu 5 harvest; gather in 收庄稼 shōu zhuāngjia harvest (or gather in ) crops 一亩稻子收了八百斤。 Yī mǔ dàozi shōu le bābǎi jīn. The rice yield was 800 jin per mu. 6 bring to an end; stop 时间不早了, 今天就收了吧。 Shíjiān bù zǎo le, jīntiān jiù shōu le ba. It's getting late. Let's call it a day. 7 restrain; control 孩子玩得心都收不回来了。 Háizi wán de xīn dōu shōu bù huílai le. The boy can't get his mind off play.
1 receive and dispatch 2 dispatcher

1 preposition in the interest of; for 为什么人的问题, 是一个根本的问题, 原则的问题。 Wèishénme rén de wèntí, shì yī ge gēnběn de wèntí, yuánzé de wèntí. The question of “for whom?” is fundamental; it is a question of principle. 为大多数人谋利益 Wèi dàduōshù rén móu lìyì work in the interests of the vast majority of people 2 preposition because of 为我们的友谊干杯! Wèi wǒmen de yǒuyì gānbēi! A toast to our friendship! 为胜利而欢呼 Wèi shènglì ér huānhū hail a victory 3 preposition for the purpose of; for the sake of 为方便起见 wèi fāngbiàn qǐjiàn for the sake of convenience 不为名, 不为利 bù wèi míng, bù wèi lì seek no personal fame or gain 让我们为实现这一宏伟目标而共同努力。 Ràng wǒmen wèi shíxiàn zhè yī hóngwěi mùbiāo ér gòngtóng nǔlì. Let us strive together to attain this splendid goal. 4 preposition to; towards 他为我送来一份请帖。 Tā wèi wǒ sòng lái yī fèn qǐngtiě. He's sent an invitation to me. 且为诸君言之。 Qiě wèi zhūjūn yán zhī. Now I'll inform you about it. 5 formal stand for; support See 为wéi
1 to take out 2 to put out 3 to provide 4 to put forward (a proposal) 5 to come up with (evidence)

in a hurry; in haste; hurriedly; hastily 你干吗这样急急忙忙的？ Nǐ gànmá zhèyàng jíjímángmáng de？ Why are you in such a hurry? 他起晚了, 没吃早饭就急忙向学校跑去。 Tā qǐ wǎn le, méi chī zǎofàn jiù jímáng xiàng xuéxiào pǎo qù. He got up late and hurriedly ran off to school without eating any breakfast.

1 catch up with; overtake 赶先进 gǎn xiānjìn catch up with the advanced 落在后面的人赶上来了。 Luò zài hòumian de rén gǎnshàng lái le. Those who lagged behind have caught up. 要说摘棉花, 可谁也赶不上她。 Yào shuō zhāi miánhua, kě shuí yě gǎn bù shàng tā. Nobody can keep up with her in picking cotton. 她已经赶到大伙儿前头去了。 Tā yǐjing gǎndào dàhuǒr qiántou qù le. She's shot ahead of all the rest of us. 2 try to catch; make a dash for; rush for 赶头班车 Gǎn tóu bānchē catch the first bus 火车七点三十分开,我们赶得及吗？ Huǒchē qī diǎn sānshí fēnkāi, wǒmen gǎndejí ma？ The train leaves at 7∶30. Can we make it? 3 hurry (or rush) through 赶任务 gǎn rènwù rush through one's job 他连夜赶写了一份报告。 Tā liányè gǎn xiě le yī fèn bàogào. He dashed off a report that very night. 赶调了一个团到灾区去帮助救灾。 Gǎn diào le yī ge tuán dào zāiqū qù bāngzhù jiùzāi. A regiment was rushed to the stricken area to help with relief work. 4 drive 赶大车 Gǎn dà chē drive a cart 把羊赶到山上去放。 Bǎ yáng gǎndào shān shàng qù fàng. Herd the sheep up the hill to graze. 5 drive away; expel 把敌人赶走 Bǎ dírén gǎnzǒu drive the enemy away; throw out the enemy 辛亥革命赶跑了一个皇帝, 但是没有摧毁封建统治的基础。 Xīnhài Gémìng gǎnpǎo le yī ge huángdì, dànshì méiyǒu cuīhuǐ fēngjiàn tǒngzhì de jīchǔ. The 1911 Revolution sent an emperor packing, but failed to demolish the foundation of feudal rule. 赶苍蝇 Gǎn cāngying whisk the flies off; brush away a fly 6 happen to; find oneself in (a situation); avail oneself of (an opportunity) 赶上一场雨 gǎnshàng yī cháng yǔ run into a rain 我去了两趟, 正赶上他下厂去了。 Wǒ qù le liǎng tàng, zhèng gǎnshàng tā xià chǎng qù le. I went there twice, but he happened to be away at the factory each time. 得赶这好天把被子晒一晒。 Děi gǎn zhè hǎotiān bǎ bèizi shài yī shài. We should air the bedding while the good weather lasts. 7 preposition till 咱俩的婚事赶年下再办吧。 Zán liǎ de hūnshì gǎn nián xià zài bàn ba. Let's put off our wedding till the Spring Festival. 赶晌午我就走。 Gǎn shǎngwu wǒ jiù zǒu. I'll be leaving at noon. 这事赶以后再谈吧。 Zhè shì gǎn yǐhòu zài tán ba. Let's discuss the matter later.

adverb 1 just; exactly 我们刚好赶上末班车。 Wǒmen gānghǎo gǎnshàng mòbānchē. We just managed to catch the last bus. 这件上衣你穿着不大不小, 刚好。 Zhè jiàn shàngyī nǐ chuānzhuó bùdàbùxiǎo, gānghǎo. This jacket fits you beautifully. 我体重刚好五十公斤。 Wǒ tǐzhòng gānghǎo wǔshí gōngjīn. I weigh just 50 kilograms, no more, no less. 你们来得刚好。 Nǐmen lái de gānghǎo. You've come in the nick of time. 2 by chance; by coincidence 他们两人刚好编在一个组里。 Tāmen liǎng rén gānghǎo biān zài yī ge zǔ lǐ. The two of them happened to be in the same group. 刚好校长在这儿, 你就跟他谈谈吧。 Gānghǎo xiàozhǎng zài zhèr, nǐ jiù gēn tā tán tán ba. The Chancellor happens to be here. You'd better talk it over with him.

1 a brush 油漆刷 yóuqī shuā paintbrush 2 clean with a brush; brush; scrub 刷鞋 shuāxié brush shoes 刷地板 shuā dìbǎn scrub the floor 刷锅 shuā guō clean (or scour) a pot 3 paint, daub, paste up, etc. with a brush 用石灰浆刷墙 yòng shíhuī jiāng shuā qiáng whitewash a wall 刷标语 shuā biāoyǔ paste up posters 4 informal eliminate; remove 那个队直到半决赛才给刷下来。 Nà ge duì zhídào bànjuésài cái gěi shuā xiàlai. adverb at (long) last; in the end; finally 她终于到了, 晚了将近半小时。 Tā zhōngyú dào le, wǎn le jiāngjìn bàn xiǎoshí. At long last she arrived, about half an hour late. 中国登山队终于胜利地登上了珠峰。 Zhōngguó dēngshānduì zhōngyú shènglì de dēng shàng le Zhūfēng. The Chinese mountaineering expedition finally succeeded in scaling Mount Qomolangma. 尽管多方医治, 终于还是把他受伤的腿锯了。 Jǐnguǎn duōfāng yīzhì, zhōngyú háishi bǎ tā shòushāng de tuǐ jù le. All the treatments were to no avail and in the end they had to amputate his wounded leg.

1 bear; endure; tolerate; put up with 相忍相安 xiāng rěn xiāng ān be tolerant towards and live in peace with one another 他忍着剧痛, 继续工作。 Tā rěn zhe jùtòng, jìxù gōngzuò. He continued to work despite the intense pain. 你就忍着点吧。 Nǐ jiù rěn zhe diǎn ba. The meeting was originally fixed for Friday. 他本来身体很瘦弱。 Tā běnlái shēntǐ hěn shòuruò. He used to be thin and weak. 3 adverb it goes without saying; of course 本来就该这样办。 Běnlái jiù gāi zhèyàng bàn. Of course it should be handled that way. 你本来用不着着急。 Nǐ běnlái yòngbuzháo zháojí. You needn't have worried about it. 这样的事本来不应该发生。 Zhèyàng de shì běnlái bù yīnggāi fāshēng. Such a thing should never have been allowed to happen in the first place.

family; household 他有一个美满幸福的家庭。 Tā yǒu yī ge měimǎn xìngfú de jiātíng. He has a happy family. 现在差不多每个家庭都有电冰箱了。 Xiànzài chàbuduō měi ge jiātíng dōu yǒu diànbīngxiāng le. Now almost every household owns a fridge.

conjunction otherwise; if not; or else 快点走, 否则要迟到了。 Kuài diǎn zǒu, fǒuzé yào chídào le. Hurry up, or we'll be late. 他一定有要紧事找你, 否则不会接连打三次电话来。 Tā yīdìng yǒu yàojǐn shì zhǎo nǐ, fǒuzé bù huì jiēlián dǎ sān cì diànhuà lái. He must have something urgent to discuss with you, otherwise he wouldn't have phoned you three times. 我们必须加强基础工业的建设, 否则经济发展就没有后劲。 Wǒmen bìxū jiāqiáng jīchǔ gōngyè de jiànshè, fǒuzé jīngjì fāzhǎn jiù méi yǒu hòujìn. hear 我听见有人敲门。 Wǒ tīng jiàn yǒurén qiāo mén. I heard a knock at the door. 她说的什么你听见了吗？ Tā shuō de shénme nǐ tīng jiàn le ma？ Did you catch what she said? 说话的声音小得几乎听不见 shuōhuà de shēngyīn xiǎo de jīhū tīng bù jiàn speak in a scarcely audible voice 你小点儿声, 我听得见。 Nǐ xiǎo diǎnr shēng, wǒ tīng de jiàn. Lower your voice. I can hear you. 我听了一会儿, 可什么也没听见。 Wǒ tīng le yīhuìr, kě shénme yě méi tīngjiàn. I listened for a while, but heard nothing. 他耳背, 听不见。 Tā ěrbèi, tīng bù jiàn. He's hard of hearing. He can't hear you.
1 notice by smell; smell 我闻见了花香。 Wǒ wén jian le huāxiāng. I smell the fragrance of a flower. 2 hear

catch sight of; see 你看见老张了吗？ Nǐ kànjian lǎo zhāng le ma？ Did you see Lao Zhang? 我看了好半天, 可是什么也没看见。 Wǒ kàn le hǎo bàntiān, kě shì shénme yě méi kànjian. I looked for a while but didn't see anything. 他们航行了二十天才看见陆地。 Tāmen hángxíng le èrshí tiān cái kànjian lùdì. help; give (or lend) a hand; do a favour; do a good turn 我要请她帮忙。 Wǒ yào qǐng tā bāngmáng. I'll ask her to help. 他来找人帮忙。 Tā lái zhǎo rén bāngmáng. He came for help. 他帮了大忙。 Tā bāng le dà máng. He's been a great help. or He's given a lot of help. 请你帮个忙。 Qǐng nǐ bāng ge máng. Will you give me a hand? 他帮不上我什么忙。 Tā bāng bù shàng wǒ shénme máng. There's hardly anything he can help me with. 他帮过我们的忙。 Tā bāng guò wǒmen de máng. He once did us a good turn. 帮忙把这封信寄一下好吗？ Bāngmáng bǎ zhè fēng xìn jì yī xià hǎo ma？ Will you do me a favour and mail this letter? 我能帮什么忙吗？ Wǒ néng bāng shénme máng ma？ Can I be of any assistance?

0 a través 1 pass through; get past; traverse 电流∼导线。 Diànliú ∼ dǎoxiàn. Electricity passes through the wires. 路太窄, 汽车∼不∼。 Lù tài zhǎi, qìchē tōng bù guò. The road is too narrow for cars to get by (or pass through). 注意交∼安全, 一慢二看三∼。 Zhùyì jiāotōng ānquán, yī màn èr kàn sān ∼. Pay attention to traffic safety; slow down, look around and then go ahead. 火车∼大桥向南奔去。 Huǒchē ∼ dà qiáo xiàng nán bēn qù. The train was crossing the bridge towards the south. 游击队∼了敌人的封锁线。 Yóujīduì ∼ le dírén de fēngsuǒxiàn. The guerrillas managed to get through the enemy blockade. 代表们∼大厅进入会场。 Dàibiǎo men ∼ dàtīng jìnrù huìchǎng. The delegates went through the lobby and into the assembly hall. or The delegates entered the assembly hall by way of the lobby. 她∼了入学考试。 Tā ∼ le rùxué kǎoshì. She's passed the entrance examination. 我们要打开局面就必须∼这一关。 Wǒmen yào dǎkāi júmiàn jiù bìxū ∼ zhè yī guān. We must overcome this obstacle to open a new phase in our work. 2 adopt; pass; carry ∼宪法 ∼ xiànfǎ adopt a constitution 以压倒多数∼ yǐ yādǎo duōshù ∼ be passed by an overwhelming majority 这个提案已一致∼。 Zhège tí'àn yǐ yīzhì ∼. The motion was carried unanimously. 我认为这议案未必∼得∼。 Wǒ rènwéi zhè yì'àn wèibì tōng de guò. I don't think the bill will get (or go) through. 3 ask the consent or approval of 这个问题要∼群众才能做出决定。 Zhège wèntí yào ∼ qúnzhòng cái néng zuòchū juédìng. No decision can be made on this matter until the masses have been consulted. preposition by means of; by way of; by; through ∼什么方式我才能见到他？ ∼ shénme fāngshì wǒ cái néng jiàndào tā？ By what means can I meet him? ∼讨论取得一致 ∼ tǎolùn qǔdé yīzhì reach unanimity through discussion 这位法国教授∼译员同我进行了交谈。 Zhè wèi Fǎguó jiàoshòu ∼ yìyuán tóng wǒ jìnxíng le jiāotán. The French professor and I had a conversation through an interpreter. ∼老张介绍, 我认识了她。 ∼ lǎo zhāng jièshào, wǒ rènshi le tā. I got to know her through Lao Zhang. 植物∼阳光照射, 能把水和二氧化碳制成有机物质。 Zhíwù ∼ yángguāng zhàoshè, néng bǎ shuǐ hé èryǎnghuàtàn zhìchéng yǒujī wùzhì. Plants can turn water and carbon dioxide into organic substance by means of sunshine.

change; alter; transform 改变主意 gǎibiàn zhǔyì change one's mind 人们的精神面貌改变了。 Rénmen de jīngshén miànmào gǎibiàn le. People's spiritual complexion has changed. 五年不见, 他的样子看来没有多大的改变。 Wǔ nián bù jiàn, tā de yàngzi kànlai méiyǒu duō dà de gǎibiàn. It's been 5 years since I last saw him, but he hasn't changed much. 历史发展的总趋势是不可改变的。 Lìshǐ fāzhǎn de zǒng qūshì shì bùkě gǎibiàn de. The general trend of history is unalterable. 情况变了, 你那计划也该改变改变。 Qíngkuàng biàn le, nǐ nà jìhuà yě gāi gǎibiàn gǎibiàn. The situation has changed, so you should make some changes in your plans.

adverb mutually; each other 互相依存 hùxiāng yīcún depend on each other for existence; be interdependent 互相排斥 hùxiāng páichì be mutually exclusive 互相配合 hùxiāng pèihé work in coordination 互相利用 hùxiāng lìyòng each using the other for his own ends 互相掣肘 hùxiāng chèzhǒu hold each other back 互相勾结 hùxiāng gōujié work in collusion

1 freedom; liberty 公民自由权 gōngmín zìyóuquán civil liberties 中国公民有言论, 通信, 出版, 集会, 结社, 游行, 示威, 罢工的自由。 Zhōngguó gōngmín yǒu yánlùn, tōngxìn, chūbǎn, jíhuì, jiéshè, yóuxíng, shìwēi, bàgōng de zìyóu. Citizens of China enjoy freedom of speech, correspondence, the press, assembly, association, procession, demonstration and the freedom to strike. 2 philosophy freedom 自由和必然 Zìyóu hé bìrán freedom and necessity 3 free; unrestrained 自由讨论 zìyóu tǎolùn have a free exchange of views 自由选择 zìyóu xuǎnzé be free to choose; have a free choice 自由行动 zìyóu xíngdòng act on one's own 自由发表意见 zìyóu fābiǎo yìjian express one's views unreservedly

1 answer; reply 无言以对 wúyányǐduì have nothing to say in reply 2 treat; cope with; counter 刀对刀,枪对枪 dāo duì dāo, qiāng duì qiāng sword against sword and spear against spear 上海队对北京队 Shànghǎi duì duì Běijīng duì the Shanghai team versus the Beijing team 3 be trained on; be directed at 枪口对着敌人 qiāngkǒu duì zhe dírén train the gun on the enemy 她的话不是对着你的。 Tā de huà bù shì duì zhe nǐ de. What she said was not directed at you. 4 mutual; face to face 对骂 duìmà call each other names 对坐 duìzuò sit facing each other 对饮 duìyǐn (two people) have a drink together 5 opposite; opposing 对岸 duì'àn the opposite bank; the other side of the river 6 bring (two things) into contact; fit one into the other 对暗号 duì ànhào exchange code words 这个榫头对不上。 Zhège sǔntou duì bù shàng. This tenon won't fit. 7 suit; agree; get along 对心眼儿 duìxīnyǎnr suit one down to the ground 对胃口 duì wèikǒu suit one's taste 8 compare; check; identify 对笔迹 duì bǐjì identify the handwriting 对号码 duì hàomǎ check numbers 9 set; adjust 对表 duì biǎo set one's watch; synchronize watches 对好望远镜的距离 duì hǎo wàngyuǎnjìng de jùlí adjust the focus of a telescope 10 right; correct 猜对了 cāi duìle guess right 这事你做得对。 Zhè shì nǐ zuò de duì. You did the right thing. 你说得很对。 Nǐ shuō de hěn duì. What you say is quite true. 对, 就这么办。 Duì, jiù zhème bàn. All right, just go ahead. 他今天神色不对。 Tā jīntiān shénsè bùduì. He doesn't look himself today. 11 mix; add 茶太浓了, 给我对点儿水。 Chá tài nóng le, gěi wǒ duì diǎnr shuǐ. Add some water to the tea, it's too strong for me. 12 divide into halves 对股劈 duìgǔ pī go halves; split fifty-fifty 13 antithetical couplet; couplet 喜对 xǐ duì wedding couplet 14 measure word pair; couple 一对花瓶 yī duì huāpíng a pair of vases 一对夫妇 yī duì fūfù a married couple 15 preposition with regard to; concerning; to 对敌狠, 对己和 duìdí hěn, duì jǐ hé ruthless to the enemy, kind to one's comrades 对这个问题的不同意见 duì zhège wèntí de bùtóng yìjian different views on this question 对青少年的教育工作 duì qīng-shàonián de jiàoyù gōngzuò educational work among young people 对无产阶级革命事业的必胜信念 duì wúchǎn jiējí gémìng shìyè de bìshèng xìnniàn a firm belief in the ultimate triumph of the proletarian revolution 对犯罪分子实行法律制裁 duì fànzuì fènzǐ shíxíng fǎlǜ zhìcái carry out legal sanctions against criminals 对健康不利 duì jiànkāng bùlì be bad for one's health 他对他父亲很尊敬。 Tā duì tā fùqin hěn zūnjìng. He has a great respect for his father. 这录音机对我来说是够好的了。 Zhè lùyīnjī duì wǒ láishuō shì gòu hǎo de le. This recorder is good enough for me.

1 difficult; hard; troublesome 很难想像 Hěn nán xiǎngxiàng it's hard to imagine 这道题难解。 Zhè dào tí nán jiě. This problem is hard to solve. 山路难走。 Shānlù nán zǒu. Mountain paths are hard to travel. 说起来容易, 做起来难。 Shuō qǐlai róngyì, zuò qǐlai nán. It's easier said than done. 2 put sb. into a difficult position 这问题一下子把我难住了。 Zhè wèntí yīxiàzi bǎ wǒ nán zhù le. The question put me on the spot. 3 hardly possible ▶ 难免 nánmiǎn , 难说 nánshuō 4 bad; unpleasant ▶ 难吃 nánchī , 难看 nánkàn See 难nàn

1 easy 蛙泳容易。 Wāyǒng róngyì. It's easy to do breaststroke. 容易的题先做。 Róngyì de tí xiān zuò. Do the easy problems first. 这台机床容易操作。 Zhè tái jīchuáng róngyì cāozuò. This lathe is easy to operate. 说起来容易做起来难。 Shuō qǐlai róngyì zuò qǐlai nán. It's easier said than done. 这种草药很容易弄到。 Zhèzhǒng cǎoyào hěn róngyì nòng dào. This medicinal herb is easy to come by. 今天的幸福来得不容易。 Jīntiān de xìngfú lái de bù róngyì. The present happy life didn't come about easily. 2 likely; liable; apt 他容易生病。 Tā róngyì shēngbìng. He often gets ill. 这容易引起误会。 Zhè róngyì yǐnqǐ wùhuì. This is liable to cause misunderstanding. 人们容易把这两个问题混淆起来。 Rénmen róngyì bǎ zhè liǎng ge wèntí hùnxiáo qǐlai. People are apt to confuse the two issues.

1 fast; quick; rapid; swift 请别说得那么快。 Qǐng bié shuō de nàme kuài. Please don't speak so fast. 我的表快五分。 Wǒ de biǎo kuài wǔfēn. My watch is five minutes fast. 他学东西快。 Tā xué dōngxi kuài. He learns quickly. 他进步很快。 Tā jìnbù hěn kuài. He has made rapid progress. 快马 kuàimǎ a swift horse 2 speed 这车能跑多快？ Zhè chē néng pǎo duō kuài？ How fast can this car go？ 3 hurry up; make haste 快上车吧! Kuài shàngchē ba! Hurry up and get on the bus! 快点儿, 车要赶不上了! Kuài diǎnr, chē yào gǎn bù shàng le! Come on, or we'll miss the bus! 快跟我走。 Kuài gēn wǒ zǒu. Quick, come with me. 4 adverb soon; before long 他快回来了。 Tā kuài huílai le. He'll be back soon. 这学期快结束了。 Zhè xuéqī kuài jiéshù le. The term will be over before long. 火车快开了。 Huǒchē kuài kāi le. The train is about to leave. 快吃午饭了。 Kuài chī wǔfàn le. It's almost time for lunch. 天快黑了。 Tiān kuài hēi le. It's getting dark. 快半夜了。 Kuài bànyè le. It's going on midnight. 快三十岁的人还没有个对象! Kuài sānshí suì de rén hái méiyǒu ge duìxiàng! The man's going on thirty but still doesn't have a girl friend! 我来了快两年了。 Wǒ lái le kuài liǎng nián le. I've been here for nearly two years. 春节快到了。 Chūnjié kuài dào le. The Spring Festival is drawing near. 5 quick-witted; nimble; clever 他脑子快。 Tā nǎozi kuài. He's quick-witted. or He has a quick mind. 6 (of a knife, sword, etc.) sharp 快刀 kuàidāo a sharp knife 7 straight-forward; forthright; plainspoken ▶ 快人快语 kuàirén-kuàiyǔ 8 pleased; happy; gratified ▶ 不快 bùkuài , 大快人心 dà kuài rénxīn 9 a yamen runner or officer charged with making arrests ▶ 捕快 bǔkuài

1 slow 反应慢 fǎnyìng màn be slow to react 他看书看得慢。 Tā kàn shū kàn de màn. He reads slowly. 他跑得慢。 Tā pǎo de màn. He's a slow runner. 病人恢复得很慢。 Bìngrén huīfù de hěn màn. The patient is making a slow recovery. 火车慢慢地驶进了车站。 Huǒchē mànmàn de shǐ jìn le chēzhàn. Slowly the train pulled into the station. 公共汽车到站时慢了下来。 Gōnggòng qìchē dào zhàn shí màn le xiàlai. The bus slowed down as it approached the stop. 我的表慢五分钟。 Wǒ de biǎo màn wǔ fēnzhōng. My watch is five minutes slow. 这钟一天慢十秒。 Zhè zhōng yī tiān màn shí miǎo. This clock loses 10 seconds a day. 他慢慢会想通的。 Tā mànmàn huì xiǎng tōng de. He'll come round by and by. 慢行 mànxíng Drive Slow (highway sign) 2 (used in imperative sentences, alone or before verbs) 我这就给她打电话去。——慢!等票子拿到了再打。 Wǒ zhè jiù gěi tā dǎ diànhuà qù. —— Màn! Děng piàozi ná dào le zài dǎ. I'm going to ring her right away.--Just a moment! Not until we get the tickets. 你慢点儿吃。 Nǐ màn diǎnr chī. Don't rush through your meal. 慢慢来, 别着急。 Mànmàn lái, bié zháojí. Take your time and don't worry. 这事慢点儿告诉他, 等两天再说。 Zhè shì màn diǎnr gàosu tā, děng liǎng tiān zàishuō. Don't tell him the news just now; wait a couple of days. supercilious; rude ▶ 傲慢 àomàn
fat; stout; plump 他胖起来了。 Tā pàng qǐlai le. He's getting fat. or He's putting on weight. See 胖pán

1 hard; stiff; tough 硬铅笔 Yìng qiānbǐ a hard pencil 硬领 yìnglǐng a stiff collar 硬刷子 yìng shuāzi a stiff brush 这根铁丝太硬, 弯不动。 Zhè gēn tiěsī tài yìng, wān bù dòng. The iron wire is too strong to bend. 2 strong; firm; tough; obstinate 心肠硬 Xīncháng yìng hardhearted 话说得很硬 huà shuō de hěn yìng express oneself in strong terms 硬不承认错误 yìng bù chéngrèn cuòwù obstinately refuse to admit one's error 硬的不行来软的。 Yìng de bùxíng lái ruǎn de. When hard tactics failed, soft methods were used. 3 manage to do sth. with difficulty 硬充好汉 yìng chōng hǎohàn act the hero 硬压住心头怒火 yìng yā zhù xīntóu nùhuǒ choke down one's anger 硬搬别人的经验 yìng bān biéren de jīngyàn copy other people's experience mechanically 4 good (quality); able (person) 货色硬 huòsè yìng goods of high quality 牌子硬 páizi yìng a trademark of high standing; a prestigious trademark

1 nervous; keyed up 神情紧张 Shénqíng jǐnzhāng look nervous 慢慢讲, 别紧张。 Mànmàn jiǎng, bié jǐnzhāng. Speak slowly and don't be nervous. 试验到了关键时刻, 大家都紧张起来。 Shìyàn dào le guānjiàn shíkè, dàjiā dōu jǐnzhāng qǐlai. Everybody was keyed up as the experiment reached a crucial point. 2 tense; intense; strained 紧张局势 jǐnzhāng júshì a tense situation 紧张气氛 jǐnzhāng qìfēn a tense atmosphere 紧张的战斗 jǐnzhāng de zhàndòu intense fighting 两国关系紧张。 Liǎng guó guānxi jǐnzhāng. Relations between the two countries are strained. 紧张而有秩序的工作 Jǐnzhāng ér yǒu zhìxù de gōngzuò intense but orderly work 团结紧张的集体生活 tuánjié jǐnzhāng de jítǐ shēnghuó a collective life marked by solidarity and activity 这场比赛真紧张! Zhè chǎng bǐsài zhēn jǐnzhāng! What an exciting game! 工程正在紧张地进行。 Gōngchéng zhèngzài jǐnzhāng de jìnxíng. Construction was in full swing. 日程安排得太紧张。 Rìchéng ānpái de tài jǐnzhāng. It's rather a tight schedule. 缓和交通运输的紧张状况 Huǎnhé jiāotōng yùnshū de jǐnzhāng zhuàngkuàng relieve the pressure on transport 3 in short supply; tight 这几天鸡蛋供应有点紧张。 Zhè jǐ tiān jīdàn gōngyìng yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng. Eggs have been in rather short supply for the last few days. or There's been rather a shortage of eggs lately. 这里只有一口井, 用水比较紧张。 Zhèlǐ zhǐ yǒu yī kǒu jǐng, yòng shuǐ bǐjiào jǐnzhāng. There's only one well here and water is in great demand. 目前这里住房相当紧张。 Mùqián zhèlǐ zhùfáng xiāngdāng jǐnzhāng. Accommodation here is pretty tight at present.

1 tall; high 这里地势很高。 Zhèlǐ dìshì hěn gāo. The terrain here is very high. 她比小红高一头。 Tā bǐ xiǎo hóng gāo yī tóu. She is a head taller than Xiao Hong. 坝高四十米。 Bà gāo sìshí mǐ. The dam is 40 metres high (or in height). 这片地中间高起一块。 Zhè piàn dì zhōngjiān gāo qǐ yī kuài. There is a mound in the middle of the field. 2 of a high level or degree; above the average 高速度 gāosùdù high speed 高年级 gāoniánjí higher (or senior) grades 高质量 gāo zhìliàng high (or good) quality 体温高 tǐwēn gāo have a fever 他的思想境界比我高。 Tā de sīxiǎng jìngjiè bǐ wǒ gāo. He has nobler thoughts than I. 他的见解比谁都高。 Tā de jiànjiě bǐ shuí dōu gāo. He has more original ideas than others do. 高风格 Gāo fēnggé fine style 高难度动作 gāonándù dòngzuò exceedingly difficult movements; operations of extraordinary difficulty 这主意真高! Zhè zhǔyi zhēn gāo! What a brilliant idea! 3 loud 嗓门高 Sǎngmén gāo have a loud voice 高喊 gāohǎn shout loudly; raise a cry 4 high-priced; dear; expensive 要价太高 yàojià tài gāo ask too high a price 5 honorific your ▶ 高见 gāojiàn 6 chemistry containing one more oxygen atom in an acid or a chemical compound ▶ 高锰酸钾 gāoměngsuānjiǎ 7 (Gāo) a surname

1 short (of stature) 我个子矮。 Wǒ gèzi ǎi. I'm short. 他比他哥哥矮一头。 Tā bǐ tā gēge ǎi yī tóu. He's a head shorter than his brother. 2 low 矮墙 ǎiqiáng a low wall 3 low in rank or grade 她在中学里比我矮一级。 Tā zài zhōngxué lǐ bǐ wǒ ǎi yījí. She was a grade lower than me in middle school.

1 (of space or time) long 这条河很长。 Zhè tiáo hé hěn cháng. This is a long river. 夏季昼长夜短。 Xiàjì zhòu chángyè duǎn. In summer the days are long and the nights short. 长长的柳条垂到湖面。 Cháng cháng de liǔtiáo chuí dào húmiàn. The long willow twigs hang low, brushing against the surface of the lake. 2 length 南京长江大桥全长六千七百七十二米。 Nánjīng Cháng Jiāng dà qiáo quáncháng liùqiān qībǎi qīshí'èr mǐ. The overall length of the Changjiang River Bridge at Nanjing is 6,772 metres. 3 strong point; forte 取人之长, 补己之短 Qǔ rén zhī cháng, bǔ jǐ zhī duǎn overcome one's shortcomings by learning from others' strong points 4 be good at; be proficient in 她长于刺绣。 Tā cháng yú cìxiù. She is good at embroidery. or Embroidery is her forte. See 长zhǎng

1 short; brief 她头发剪得短短的。 Tā tóufa jiǎn de duǎnduǎn de. She had her hair cut short. 这条路最短。 Zhè tiáo lù zuì duǎn. This is the shortest way. 冬季日短夜长。 Dōngjì rì duǎn yè cháng. In winter the days are short and the nights long. 我给他写了封短信。 Wǒ gěi tā xiě le fēng duǎn xìn. I dropped him a few lines. 开个短会 Kāi ge duǎn huì have a brief meeting 2 lack; owe 一个月短两天 yī ge yuè duǎn liǎng tiān two days short of a month; a month less two days 别人都来了,就短他一个。 Biéren dōu lái le, jiù duǎn tā yī ge. All the others are here; he's the only one missing. 短你三块钱。 Duǎn nǐ sān kuài qián. I owe you three yuan. 3 weak point; fault ▶ 揭短 jiēduǎn

1 big; large; great 大城市 dà chéngshì big city 大眼睛 dà yǎnjing big eyes 大救星 dà jiùxīng great liberator 这张照片不够大。 Zhè zhāng zhàopiàn bù gòu dà. The picture isn't large enough. 2 heavy (rain, etc.); strong (wind, etc.) 雪下得很大。 Xuě xià de hěn dà. The snow is falling heavily. 风太大, 你没法放风筝。 Fēng tài dà, nǐ méi fǎ fàng fēngzheng. The wind is too strong to fly your kite. 外面风大。 Wàimian fēng dà. It's blowing hard. 团结起来力量大。 Tuánjié qǐlai lìliang dà. Unity is strength. 3 loud 声音太大 Shēngyīn tài dà too loud 收音机开大点。 Shōuyīnjī kāi dà diǎn. Turn the radio up a bit louder. 4 general; main; major 大马路 dàmǎlù main street 大问题 dà wèntí major issue; big problem 大手术 dàshǒushù major operation 大反攻 dà fǎngōng general counteroffensive 5 size 那间屋子有这间两个大。 Nà jiān wūzi yǒu zhè jiān liǎng ge dà. That roomis twice the size of this one. 你穿多大的鞋？ Nǐ chuān duō dà de xié？ What size shoes do you wear? 6 age 你的孩子多大了？ Nǐ de háizi duō dà le？ How old is your child? 他大我两岁。 Tā dà wǒ liǎng suì. He's two years my senior. 7 adverb greatly; fully 大长中国人民的志气 Dà zhǎng Zhōngguó rénmín de zhìqi greatly heighten the morale of the Chinese people 大笑 dàxiào laugh heartily 天已大亮。 Tiān yǐ dà liàng. It's already broad daylight. 8 adverb in a big way; on a big (or large) scale; with all-out efforts; vigorously 大删大改 Dà shān dà gǎi do a thorough job in revising 大搞农田水利 dà gǎo nóngtián shuǐlì go all out with irrigation and water conservancy 9 eldest 大哥 dàgē eldest brother 大房 dàfáng senior branch of a family 10 honorific your 大札 dàzhá your letter 大作 dàzuò your writing 11 (used before a time word, etc. to show emphasis) 大清早 dàqīngzǎo early in the morning 12 see 不大 bùdà dialect 1 father 2 father's brother; uncle See 大dài

1 small; little; petty; minor 小屋 xiǎowū a small room or house 小河 xiǎohé a small river 小姑娘 xiǎogūniang a little girl 小国 xiǎoguó a small country 小事 xiǎoshì a small matter 小问题 xiǎo wèntí a minor question 小手术 xiǎoshǒushù a minor operation 那个数量很小。 Nàge shùliàng hěn xiǎo. That's a very small amount. 你的声音太小。 Nǐ de shēngyīn tài xiǎo. Your voice is too soft. 风小些了。 Fēng xiǎo xiē le. The wind has dropped a little. 鞋小了点。 Xié xiǎo le diǎn. These shoes are a bit too tight. 2 young 他还小呢。 Tā hái xiǎo ne. He's still young. 你也不小了。 Nǐ yě bù xiǎo le. You're not young any more. 她比我小。 Tā bǐ wǒ xiǎo. She's younger than I am. 3 of short duration 小坐片刻 xiǎozuòpiànkè sit for a while 4 the last in order of seniority 小儿子 xiǎo'érzi the youngest son 他是我小弟弟。 Tā shì wǒ xiǎo dìdi. He is my youngest brother. 5 (used before names of animals to indicate the young) 小鸡 xiǎojī chick 小鸭 xiǎoyā duckling 小狗 xiǎo gǒu pup; puppy 小猫 xiǎomāo kitten; kitty 小牛 xiǎoniú calf; heifer 小羊 xiǎoyáng lamb; kid 小马 xiǎomǎ pony; foal; colt 小猪 xiǎozhū piggy; piglet; shoat 小鹿 xiǎolù deerlet; fawn 小老虎 xiǎolǎohǔ tiger cub 6 little ones; children 一家大小 yī jiā dà xiǎo the whole family, old and young 上有老, 下有小 shàng yǒu lǎo, xià yǒu xiǎo have the old above and the young below--have parents and children to care for 7 concubine 讨个小 tǎo ge xiǎo take a concubine 8 humble my; our 小女 xiǎonǚ my daughter 小店 xiǎodiàn my store 9 (used before family name, givenname, etc.) 小张 xiǎo zhāng Xiao Zhang 小强 xiǎo qiáng Xiao Qiang 小三儿 xiǎo sānr Xiao Sanr (childhood name for one's third child)
1 man; male 男病房 nánbìngfáng men's ward 男护士 nánhùshi male nurse 男主人公 nánzhǔréngōng hero 男学生 nánxuésheng boy student 男佣人 nányòngrén manservant 2 son; boy 长男 zhǎngnán one's eldest son baron ▶ 男爵 nánjué

young 年轻人 niánqīngrén young people 年轻力壮 niánqīnglìzhuàng young and vigorous 年轻一代 niánqīng yī dài the younger (or rising) generation 干部要年轻化。 Gànbù yào niánqīnghuà. Let the age of our government officials be younger in average.

1 old (not young) 老妇人 lǎofùrén an old woman 老马 lǎo mǎ an old horse 老树 lǎoshù an old tree 他父亲很老了。 Tā fùqin hěn lǎo le. His father is very old. 我老了, 走路走不快了。 Wǒ lǎo le, zǒulù zǒu bù kuài le. I'm getting old and can't walk very fast. 他六十多岁了, 可是一点也不显老。 Tā liùshí duō suì le, kěshì yīdiǎn yě bù xiǎn lǎo. He's over sixty, but he doesn't look old at all. 2 old people; a venerable old man 敬老 jìnglǎo show respect for the aged 徐老 xú lǎo our revered Comrade Xu 3 informal euphemistic (followed by 了; usu. of an old person) pass away; die 隔壁前天老了人了。 Gébì qiántiān lǎo le rén le. One of our next-door neighbours (presumably an old person) died the day before yesterday. 4 experienced; veteran 老作家 Lǎo zuòjiā a veteran writer 5 old (not new) 老朋友 lǎopéngyou an old friend 老部下 lǎo bùxia a former subordinate 老厂 lǎo chǎng an old factory 老机器 lǎo jīqì an old machine 老地方 lǎo dìfang the same old place 老习惯 lǎo xíguàn an old habit 一首老歌 yī shǒu lǎo gē an old song 这种纸烟牌子很老了。 Zhèzhǒng zhǐyān páizi hěn lǎo le. This is a very old brand of cigarettes. 这所房子太老了。 Zhè suǒ fángzi tài lǎo le. This house is too old. 6 (of vegetables) overgrown 菠菜不收就老了。 Bōcài bù shōu jiù lǎo le. The spinach will be overgrown if we don't get it in now. 7 (of food) tough; overdone; well-done 牛肉太老。 Niúròu tài lǎo. The beef is too tough. 我喜欢吃老一点的牛排。 Wǒ xǐhuan chī lǎo yīdiǎn de niúpái. I like steak quite well-done. 鸡蛋煮老了。 Jīdàn zhǔ lǎo le. The eggs have been boiled hard. 青菜不要炒得太老。 Qīngcài bùyào chǎo de tài lǎo. Don't overcook the greens. 8 (of certain colours) dark 老绿(红) Lǎo lǜ (hóng) dark green (red) 这件上衣颜色太老了。 Zhè jiàn shàngyī yánsè tài lǎo le. This jacket is too dark. 9 adverb for a long time 老没见你啊。 Lǎo méi jiàn nǐ a. I haven't seen you for ages. 这屋子老不住人, 有股霉味儿。 Zhè wūzi lǎo bù zhù rén, yǒu gǔ méi wèir. This room has been left vacant for a long time, so there is a mouldy smell. 10 adverb always; all the time 他老跟我借钱。 Tā lǎo gēn wǒ jiè qián. He's always borrowing money from me. 他老那么干。 Tā lǎo nàme gàn. He does it all the time. 11 adverb very 老早 lǎozǎo very early 老远 lǎoyuǎn far away 老长的胡子 lǎo cháng de húzi a very long beard 太阳已经老高了。 Tàiyáng yǐjing lǎo gāo le. The sun is already high. 12 informal last born; youngest 老闺女 lǎoguīnü the youngest daughter 老儿子 lǎo'érzi the youngest son 13 (used as a prefix) a (in terms of address before the surnames of acquaintances or friends to indicate intimacy or informality) 老王 lǎo wáng Lao Wang 老李 lǎo lǐ Lao Li b (in kinship terms before numerals to indicate order of seniority) 老大 lǎodà number one (among sons, daughters, brothers, or sisters) 老二 lǎo'èr number two 老三 lǎo sān number three 老幺 lǎoyāo the youngest c (in certain names of animals and plants) ▶ 老虎 lǎohǔ , 老玉米 lǎoyùmi 14 (Lǎo) a surname

1 good; fine; nice 好人 hǎorén a nice person 天气真好。 Tiānqì zhēn hǎo. The weather's really nice. 祖国的好儿子 Zǔguó de hǎo érzi a worthy (or fine) son of our country 庄稼长得真好。 Zhuāngjia zhǎng de zhēn hǎo. The crops are doing well. 2 friendly; kind 好朋友 Hǎo péngyou a good (or great) friend 他们对我真好。 Tāmen duì wǒ zhēn hǎo. They are really kind to me. 这两个孩子又好了。 Zhè liǎng ge háizi yòu hǎo le. The two children are friends again. 3 be in good health; get well 我的病好了。 Wǒ de bìng hǎo le. I'm well (or all right) now. 你好哇! Nǐ hǎo wa! How are you? 4 be ready; done 饭好了。 Fàn hǎo le. The food (or rice) is ready. 5 (used after verbs to indicate finishing or finishing satisfactorily) 这件事他做不好。 Zhè jiàn shì tā zuò bù hǎo. He can't do that job well. 我把他的病治好了。 Wǒ bǎ tā de bìng zhì hǎo le. I cured his illness. 坐好吧, 要开会了。 Zuò hǎo ba, yào kāihuì le. Take your seats, please. The meeting is going to begin. 6 adverb (used before verbs) be good to; be easy to 好喝 hǎohē good to drink 这个问题好回答。 Zhège wèntí hǎo huídá. This question is easy to answer. 这本书可不好买。 Zhè běn shū kě bù hǎo mǎi. This book is not easily available. 暖瓶放在这儿好拿。 Nuǎnpíng fàng zài zhèr hǎo ná. It's handy to have the thermos here. 7 interjection (used at the beginning of a sentence or clause, to express agreement, disapproval, surprise, etc.) 好, 就这么办。 Hǎo, jiù zhème bàn. O.K. , it's settled. 好了, 不要再说了。 Hǎo le, bùyào zài shuō le. All right, no need to say any more. 好, 这下可麻烦了。 Hǎo, zhè xià kě máfan le. Well, we're in for trouble now. 好!那得多少钱! Hǎo! Nà dé duōshao qián! Gosh! How much money will that cost! 我一看, 好, 都走了。 Wǒ yī kàn, hǎo, dōu zǒu le. I took a look, gosh, everybody has left. 8 adverb the better to; in order to; so that 今儿早点睡, 明儿好早起赶火车。 Jīnr zǎodiǎn shuì, míngr hǎo zǎoqǐ gǎn huǒchē. Let's turn in early, so as to get up early tomorrow to catch the train. 把她的地址告诉我, 我好找她。 Bǎ tā de dìzhǐ gàosu wǒ, wǒ hǎo zhǎo tā. Tell me her address so that I can go and see her. 9 adverb (used before adjectives with exclamatory force) very; quite; so 今天好冷。 Jīntiān hǎo lěng. Today is quite cold. 你好大胆子。 Nǐ hǎo dà dǎnzi. You are so daring. 好大的工程! Hǎo dà de gōngchéng! What a huge project! 10 adverb (used before adjectives in the same way as 多) to what extent; how 火车站离这儿好远？ Huǒchēzhàn lí zhèr hǎo yuǎn？ How far is the railway station from here? 11 adverb (used before indefinite numbers) quite a few 好几个 hǎojǐgè quite a few 好几天 hǎojǐtiān quite a few days 好半天 hǎobàntiān quite a while 12 dialect may; can; should 我好进来吗？ Wǒ hǎo jìnlai ma？ May I come in? 时间不早了, 你好走了。 Shíjiān bù zǎo le, nǐhǎo zǒu le. It's getting late. You ought to get going. See 好hào

1 bad; harmful 坏习惯 huài xíguàn bad habit 坏透了 huài tòule downright bad; rotten to the core 坏天气 huài tiānqì foul weather 坏书 huài shū a harmful book 2 become or make bad; ruin; spoil 鱼坏了。 Yú huài le. The fish has gone bad. 身体坏 Shēntǐ huài be in poor health 他胃口坏了。 Tā wèikǒu huài le. He has lost his appetite. 看小字会看坏眼睛的。 Kàn xiǎozì huì kàn huài yǎnjing de. Small type hurts the eyes. 雹子把庄稼砸坏了。 Báozi bǎ zhuāngjia zá huài le. The hail damaged the crop. 肚子吃坏了 Dùzi chī huài le have an upset stomach 3 (used after certain verbs or adjectives) extremely 吓坏了 xiàhuài le be badly scared 气坏了 qì huài le be beside oneself with rage 乐坏了 lèhuàile be wild with joy 累坏了 lèi huài le be dead tired; be dog-tired 4 evil idea; dirty trick ▶ 使坏 shǐhuài
1 handsome 2 graceful 3 smart 4 commander in chief 5 (coll.) cool! 6 sweet!

1 ugly; unsightly; hideous 长得不丑 zhǎng de bù chǒu not bad-looking 2 disgraceful; shameful; scandalous 这种事太丑了, 不要说出去。 Zhèzhǒng shì tài chǒu le, bùyào shuō chūqu. This is really disgraceful. Don't breathe a word of it to anyone.

postal matter; post; mail 挂号邮件 guàhào yóujiàn registered post 航空邮件 hángkōng yóujiàn air mail 小包邮件 xiǎobāo yóujiàn a postal packet 早班邮件几点到？ Zǎobān yóujiàn jǐ diǎn dào？ When does the morning post come in? 末班邮件几点走? Mò bān yóujiàn jǐ diǎn zǒu？ When does the last post go out? 今天的邮件量特别大。 Jīntiān de yóujiàn liàng tèbié dà. There's an unusually heavy post (or mail) today.
